private void passage1_Init()
{
	base.Passages["Start2"] = new StoryPassage("Start2", new string[]
	{
		"ck",
		"updated"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage1_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage1_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("MY FATHER'S WORK");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Choose a Scenario ");
		if (this.Vars.players == 2)
		{
			yield return base.text("for 2 players:");
		}
		if (this.Vars.players == 3)
		{
			yield return base.text("for 3 players:");
		}
		if (this.Vars.players == 4)
		{
			yield return base.text("for 4 players:");
		}
		if (this.Vars.players == 5)
		{
			yield return base.text("for 5 players:");
		}
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("A Time of War", "NoLink", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Fear and Politics", "NoLink", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("The Cost of Disease", "Preparations-TCOD", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("For an explanation of how to use this ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text("Storybook,");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.link("click here.", "StoryBook", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.tracker = 0;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage2_Init()
{
	base.Passages["Fever1"] = new StoryPassage("Fever1", new string[]
	{
		"HUB"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage2_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage2_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("YELLOW FEVER - Early Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 1;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.tcodgen1 == 0 || this.Vars.tcodgen1 == "")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "StartPlayerToken";
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Turn to ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("The Cost of Disease");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("section of the Village Chronicle. Then, turn to ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("page 1");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" ");
			using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("(this is noted by the matching The Cost of Disease symbol:");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S1_ScenarioIcon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text("). ");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Retrieve the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S1_HeartToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("tokens from the Scenario box and keep them in a supply near the board.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Give the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Start Player");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("marker to ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				if (this.Vars.players == 2)
				{
					yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
					{
						this.Vars.nameA,
						this.Vars.nameB
					}));
				}
				if (this.Vars.players == 3)
				{
					yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
					{
						this.Vars.nameA,
						this.Vars.nameB,
						this.Vars.nameC
					}));
				}
				if (this.Vars.players == 4)
				{
					yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
					{
						this.Vars.nameA,
						this.Vars.nameB,
						this.Vars.nameC,
						this.Vars.nameD
					}));
				}
				if (this.Vars.players == 5)
				{
					yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
					{
						this.Vars.nameA,
						this.Vars.nameB,
						this.Vars.nameC,
						this.Vars.nameD,
						this.Vars.nameE
					}));
				}
				yield return base.text(".");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("BUILD A HOSPITAL");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The church can no longer handle the influx of the diseased and needs to expand their facilities. Each time a player visits the church, they may donate funds and assistance towards building a new Hospital by paying money to the supply. Depending on the amount spent ($0, $1, or $2), the player will receive 1, 2, or 3 ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S1_HeartToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and lose 1, 2, or 3 ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(". ");
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("You do not pay extra ($) for placing a piece if another player has already placed at the church.");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("At the end of the Generation, the player with the most ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S1_HeartToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("tokens will gain ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("5VP.");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("If there is a tie, all tied players gain 5VP each.");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.creepy4 == 0)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"storybook\" index=0>");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" Attracting Attention");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("If a player reaches the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("4th");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" space on the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" Track, ");
			yield return base.link("click here", "Gen1-CreepyTrack", null);
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.sane3 == 0)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"storybook\" index=0>");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" The Mark of Genius");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("If a player reaches the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("3rd");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" space on the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Insanity_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" Track, ");
			yield return base.link("click here.", "Gen1-SanityTrack", null);
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{

		{
			yield return base.text("Second round Event - Election Season");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();

		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0002"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click here to continue to the next round...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0002", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage2_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;

	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage3_Init()
{
	base.Passages["Hospital1"] = new StoryPassage("Hospital1", new string[]
	{
		"HUB"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage3_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage3_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("THRIVING IN ADVERSITY - Early Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 7;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.twopage == 0 || this.Vars.twopage == "")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			if (this.Vars.seedy == "yes")
			{
				this.Vars._SetupImage = "AngryMobSetup2";
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			else
			{
				this.Vars._SetupImage = "AngryMobSetup1";
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			if (this.Vars.building == "bank")
			{
				yield return base.text("Turn to page 4 of the Village Chronicle.");
			}
			else
			{
				yield return base.text("Turn to page 5 of the Village Chronicle.");
			}
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Place the Suspicion marker on space ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				if (this.Vars.players > 3 && (this.Vars.Hospital1 == 0 || this.Vars.Hospital1 == ""))
				{
					this.Vars.Hospital1 = 1;
					this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) - 1;
				}
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.tracker);
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("and the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("token ");
			if (this.Vars.seedy == "yes")
			{
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("two");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" spaces to the left (due to some seedy dealings).");
			}
			else
			{
				yield return base.text("one space to the left.");
			}
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Then, place a ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("token on ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("space 35");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("of the VP track. ");
			if (this.Vars.players == 3)
			{
				yield return base.text("Then, since this is a 3 player game, pass the starting player marker clockwise 1 additional time.");
			}
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text(" Board of Trustees");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Due to the efforts of your family, the Hospital has graciously awarded you with a seat on the Hospital's board of trustees. All players MUST personally visit the Hospital at least one time during this Generation by placing their Self on the Hospital space in town.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("first time");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("you visit the Hospital with your Self, ");
		yield return base.link("click here to confirm.", "HospitalVisitCheck", null);
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("(If, for any reason, you have not visited the Hospital by the end of this Generation, lose 6VP and an Estate Upgrade of your choice, if possible.)");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Hospital");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("For an explanation of the Hospital action space, ");
		yield return base.link("click here.", "HospitalDefine", null);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.cured == 0)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" The Cure");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Whenever a player completes the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Yellow Fever Inoculation ");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.link("click here for a special message.", "YellowFeverCureSignin", null);
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	if (this.Vars.cured == 1)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" The Panacea");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Whenever a player completes the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Panacea");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.link("click here for a special message...", "Panacea", null);
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.sciadv == 0)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" Scientific Advances");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("If a player completes a total of 3 B or C-Level ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.sci3);
			yield return base.text(" Experiments this Generation, ");
			yield return base.link("click here for a special reward.", "Trigger3Experiments", null);
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.trigger35 == 0)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" Victory Ahead");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("If a player reaches or passes the Storybook token on space 35 of the Victory Point Track, ");
			yield return base.link("click here for a special message", "Trigger35Points", null);
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("University Symposium");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("At the end of the second round, a Symposium in the field of ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.sci3);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("will be held to determine the fate of a ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("University");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("in town in the spot where the Traveling Caravan resides. Success will be determined by our combined dedication to completing ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.sci3);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("Experiments.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0003"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click here at the end of the round to move to the next round...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0003", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage3_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage4_Init()
{
	base.Passages["Devastation1"] = new StoryPassage("Devastation1", new string[]
	{
		"HUB"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage4_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage4_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Devastation - Early Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.ispasscode = true;
	this.Vars.round = 4;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.devpage == 0 || this.Vars.devpage == "")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			if (this.Vars.seedy == "yes")
			{
				this.Vars._SetupImage = "AngryMobSetup2";
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			else
			{
				this.Vars._SetupImage = "AngryMobSetup1";
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			yield return base.text("Turn to page ");
			if (this.Vars.building == "bank")
			{
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("12");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
			}
			else
			{
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("13");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
			}
			yield return base.text(" of the Village Chronicle. Place the Suspicion marker on space ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				if (this.Vars.Devastation1 == 0 || this.Vars.Devastation1 == "")
				{
					this.Vars.Devastation1 = 1;
					this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) + 2;
					if (this.Vars.players == 4)
					{
						this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) + 3;
					}
					if (this.Vars.players == 5)
					{
						this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) + 3;
					}
				}
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.tracker);
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" and the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" token ");
			if (this.Vars.seedy == "yes")
			{
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("two");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" spaces to the left (due to some seedy dealings).");
			}
			else
			{
				yield return base.text("one space to the left.");
			}
			yield return base.text(" Pass the Start Player token to the player with the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S1_HeartToken\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(".");
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text(" Clandestine Meetings");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("When a player reveals their Sealed Envelope card, complete the location's action and then ");
		yield return base.link("click here for a special secret message.", "Envelopes", null);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text(" Relief from Disease");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A \"Hereditary Disease\" Experiment card can be completed by taking the Perform Experiment action as normal. Completing this Experiment will allow you to ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("ignore all ill effects");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("from Disease between rounds.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("When a player completes their Hereditary Disease Experiment, ");
		yield return base.link("click here for a special message.", "HereditaryDiseaseComplete", null);
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000000004"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click here at the end of the round to move to the next round...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000000004", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage04_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage5_Init()

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage5_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GENERATION I:");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Yellow Fever");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The siblings' arrival to claim their considerable inheritance was met with the indifference of a murky countryside, gray and overcast. The sky was heavy with moisture, but could not crack into a tempest, as if heralding the unfortunate circumstances to which they would soon find themselves.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Upon reaching the village, a foul stench tinged the air as teams of horses pulled the charcoal wagons like a silent funeral procession through the muddy streets. Emaciated peasants shielded their faces from the ashen gloom, seemingly unbothered by the display, and went about their somber activities uninterrupted. Several canvas-bound carts lined the edges of the main road, the dismal, gray skin of a human foot sometimes dangling freely from a rip in the fabric.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The Yellow Fever had struck the village, and for several weeks any visit to its somber limits forced the young heirs to keep a cloth handkerchief about their mouth and nostrils to protect from the miasma. While they were remiss to admit it, this seemed the perfect macabre backdrop in which to advance their father's dreadful business.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("While the prevailing mood in the village was one of morose caution, the young entrepreneurs saw potential in these darkened streets. A particularly ambitious individual could lift this gray village into a thriving city. Perhaps even an aristocrat with coin to spare could make a persuasive argument as to its direction.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("As the kindred surveyed the dreary countryside from behind the iron gates of their estate, they watched the billowing mists move slowly across the valley. The townsfolk stirred as a disquieting laugh echoed down from the hillside. They were excited to begin their father's work in earnest!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "Dubious", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.wolves = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"evil",
		"good"
	});
	if (this.Vars.wolves == "good")
	{
		this.Vars.hunters = "evil";
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.hunters = "good";
	}
	this.Vars.tcodgen1 = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage8_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Financial Woes");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	string arg = "Remove all player pieces from the board and Perform the End of a Generation. Return all <b>Dubious Bartering</b> cards to the box. Return any remaining <sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0> tokens to the supply.";
	Action<string, int> s_OnEndOfGeneration = ViewEndOfGeneration.S_OnEndOfGeneration;
	if (s_OnEndOfGeneration != null)
	{
		s_OnEndOfGeneration(arg, 3);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The village of ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("was, for lack of a more appropriate term, agricultural in its funds and like many similar small villages, were woefully unprepared for the ravages of disease. Despite the generosity (or lack thereof) of the family, the church's already severely limited resources have been stretched to their limit in their distinctly unscientific attempts to stem the spread of infection. With no more donations to call upon, the diocese turned to the local financial institutions for aide.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.building == "bank")
	{
		yield return base.text("With additional financial capital from the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Bank");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(", the church obtained the funds needed to build a Hospital. ");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "Hospitalintro", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("The addition of a ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Library");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" to the already strained finances of the village proved insurmountable, and the church failed to build a Hospital. Perhaps the lifestyle of an aristocrat blinded the mayor to this reality, but it was certain that the village would progress down a darker path.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "DevastationIntro", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage9_Init()

	base.Passages["S5Fate2"] = new StoryPassage("S5Fate2", new string[]

		"END"

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage9_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("FATE of the Infected");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	string arg = "Remove all player pieces from the board and Perform the End of a Generation. Return all <b>Dubious Bartering</b> cards to the box. Return any remaining <sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0> tokens to the supply.";
	Action<string, int> s_OnEndOfGeneration = ViewEndOfGeneration.S_OnEndOfGeneration;
	if (s_OnEndOfGeneration != null)
	{
		s_OnEndOfGeneration(arg, 3);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.heart = 3;
	}
	else if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.heart = 6;
	}
	else if (this.Vars.players == 4)
	{
		this.Vars.heart = 8;
	}
	else if (this.Vars.players == 5)
	{
		this.Vars.heart = 10;
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.heart = 3;
	}
	this.Vars.hearttotal = this.macros1.random(1.0, 6.0) + this.Vars.heart;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The congregation and citizenry, stricken with the weight of those lost in the battle with Yellow Fever, could only provide a meager sum, which placed the financial future of the village into the hands of the most charitable scientists.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.charitytotal > this.Vars.hearttotal)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SUCCESS!");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("With charitable contributions totaling over ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.hearttotal);
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" <sprite=\"S1_HeartToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(", the Hospital was built. The additional medical infrastructure provided the town a respite from another severe outbreak and ushered in a new era.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.link("Succeeded in Building the Hospital", "Hospitalintro", null);
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("FAILURE!");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("With charitable contributions failing to exceed ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.hearttotal);
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" <sprite=\"S1_HeartToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(", the Hospital was not built. This ill-timed news was delivered just as several new cases of influenza spread across the region. Without the Hospital, the results were drastic.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.link("Failed to Build the Hospital", "DevastationIntro", null);
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage11_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("THE CRAWL - Early Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 16;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.gen3pg == 0 || this.Vars.gen3pg == "")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "AngryMobSetup1";
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Turn to ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("page 8");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("of the Village Chronicle. Retrieve the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("tokens from the box.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Place the Suspicion Marker on space ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				if (this.Vars.players == 2)
				{
					yield return base.text("5");
				}
				else if (this.Vars.players == 3)
				{
					yield return base.text("6");
				}
				else if (this.Vars.players == 4)
				{
					yield return base.text("7");
				}
				else if (this.Vars.players == 5)
				{
					yield return base.text("8");
				}
				else
				{
					yield return base.text("5");
				}
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("and the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("token one space to the left. ");
			if (this.Vars.players == 3)
			{
				yield return base.text("Then, since this is a 3-player game, pass the starting player marker clockwise 1 additional time.");
			}
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("PUB");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("If your token is overtaken by the ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(", in addition to visiting the Church you can also visit any Pub. When you visit a Pub marked with a ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and 0 symbol, ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("reset your ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("to zero");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("by buying a couple rounds at the Pub. Then, immediately ");
		yield return base.link("click here for a Bar-venture.", "Barventures", null);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("MASTERWORK");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Masterwork can be completed by taking the Perform Experiment action and paying all of its costs.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

private void passage12_Init()

	{
		"INTRO"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage12_Main));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage12_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GENERATION II:");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Thriving in Adversity");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It is said that springtime under the watchful eye of the snow-tipped Carpathian mountains is a wondrous sight to behold. A single excursion in these rolling hills amongst the paths that split green grass is said to reinvigorate the lonely traveler. It is common to catch the aroma of sweet bread in the air, the sounds of babbling streams with moss-covered roots sipping the cool waters, and the richness of golden honey sunsets illuminating the countryside. If but for one season, a certain blitheness, a blissful simplicity of purpose alights the torch of poetry in the dark minds of men.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Therefore, perhaps it is most appropriate that the return of the scientists coincided with this season, as thanks to their predecessors' aid the town had become rejuvenated. The ashen grayness that once dominated the small town had been brightened, like the azalea flowers and crocus that now bloomed in window boxes along the streets.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The new hospital had become a site of great hope and strength for the people and the town was able to weather the disease even while the newspapers described the bleakness of the surrounding cities. Due to the work of their progenitors, honorary positions on the board of trustees at the hospital were awarded to their sons and daughters; positions which they sadly could not refuse. However, this controlled proximity to the ravages of disease also offered a boon for scientific inquiries and exploration.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("This serendipitous push forward in disease prevention attracted the attention of not only the diocese, but also the scientific community hoping to replicate their success. There were even rumors of a government-sponsored university; a prospect that caused great tension within the church and the townsfolk used to their isolated and bucolic existences.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The possibilities for advancement - and exploitation - seemed limitless. But, would their ingenious and unorthodox ambitions prove too unconventional for the cautious minds of academia? Or would the pressures of rejection from their peers break their indomitable spirit?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.building == "bank")
	{
		this.Vars.hos = 4;
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.hos = 5;
	}
	this.Vars.twopage = 0;
	this.Vars.life = 0;
	this.Vars.fevervp = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		4,
		5,
		6,
		7
	});
	this.Vars.fevermoney = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		8,
		9,
		10,
		11
	});
	this.Vars.gen3pg = 0;
	this.Vars.setinf = 0;
	this.Vars.pana = 0;
	this.Vars.hospA = 0;
	this.Vars.hospB = 0;
	this.Vars.hospC = 0;
	this.Vars.hospD = 0;
	this.Vars.hospE = 0;
	this.Vars.cured = 0;
	this.Vars.sciadv = 0;
	this.Vars.trigger35 = 0;
	this.Vars.lifeA = 0;
	this.Vars.lifeB = 0;
	this.Vars.lifeC = 0;
	this.Vars.lifeD = 0;
	this.Vars.lifeE = 0;
	this.Vars.life = 0;
	this.Vars.hospcount = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "EradicateDisease", null);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	{
		yield return base.text("Check to make sure the player with ");

			yield return base.text("Lycanthropic Strength");
		}

		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("lose 5VP.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	if (this.Vars.immort == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.text("Check to make sure the player with ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Immortality");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" completed their Masterwork. If they did not, they ");

		{
			yield return base.text("lose 5VP.");
		}
		styleScope = null;

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	}
	styleScope = null;

	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage14_Main()

	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GENERATION III:");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The University Advances");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.theme = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"\"Chemistry\"",
		"\"Engineering\"",
		"\"Biology\""
	});
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("They observed the city from the windows of their manor; watched as men in their brown sack suits and women with sashes tied firmly about their waists wandered the bustling sidewalks and modern pathways that winded throughout the university. What was once a bucolic and unknown region had developed into a thriving metropolis.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("And yet, it was that very same prosperity of the city that taunted them. Was it not their family's genius, their forebear's business acumen and ambition that exiled disease from the country? Was it not their shrewd antecedents that secured the government's funding of a university  the same who entered into this generation with the secret to eternal life?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Still the townsfolk eyed them as they would a foreigner, with silent judgement in their hearts. While the administration of the university offered assistance and reached out with kind words of encouragement, it was clear to the family that their presence was not truly appreciated. With each passing day, their resentment grew deeper. It seethed under the surface of their ambitious, technical labors.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Science should not be contained by the arbitrary limits of ethics. They believed that this was their chance to legitimize the family's research and to prove that bold, swift, and unmitigatable genius would propel the world forward. The ends would justify the means. From darkness, an electric spark would form to capture the entire scientific world within its grasp!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "UniMayor", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

The once bright village they remembered from their eccentric youth was mired in gray fog that clung to the ashen streets. Their carriage nearly unchained itself in the deep muddy ruts of the dilapidated roads nearby.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Not much is written about this time aside from journal entries from the young scientists that all echo an immediate revulsion towards the circumstances in which they found themselves and the sense of despair among the townsfolk. Photographs show us some evidence that the hospital was still in operation but its facilities had fallen into disrepair. The university that had once represented a bastion of new science was reduced to rubble, and in its place a disreputable tavern emerged.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("In fact, several public houses had been built upon the main thoroughfare. When the government denied the town a university, the backlash from the peasantry was swift. The citizens developed a sharp distrust of modern advances in science and medicine and were wary of those who displayed signs of intelligence. The grudge they harbored even prevented the extension of the electrical grid to a town in most desperate need of modern updates.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("There was an emptiness in the dusty hallways and barren passageways of the ruined Estates and this hollowness pressed upon the cousins' minds most forcefully. For years, they would be forced into secrecy, listless and isolated from their colleagues, their sense of ambition cut short at the most crucial interval. And while a visit to one of the spirited establishments would help quell the masses, the indulgence only made the gravity of the situation wear more heavily upon their features.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.final5 = 3;
	this.Vars.bar = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Continue...", "CreepyStar", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("THE END?");

	yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"Then, we were treated to a ghastly vivisection of a wailing goat while an electrical device stimulated the nervous reflexes. Had I known, I would have brought an umbrella.",
		"Steam shot from the abominable contraption's eye sockets as the speaker mumbled a rhythmic incantation that, if it had any effect at all, was to cause a ringing in my ears for hours afterward."
	}));
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("A professional scolding soon followed from notable experts in the ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.sci3);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("field. Accused of peddling contentious pseudo-science, the cousins were informed that they would not be receiving any invitations for lecture opportunities in the future.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The family returned home, each writing scathing remarks within their respective journals. They concluded that while they were no longer welcome at the University, \"they were also never planning to return anyway.\"");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.uni = "no";
	this.Vars.final5 = 5;
	if (this.Vars.pana == "unleash")
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "PanaceaUnleash", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "Hospital3", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage29_Main()
{

	}

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{

		{
			yield return base.text("BUILD A HOSPITAL");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The church can no longer handle the influx of the diseased and needs to expand their facilities. Each time a player visits the church, they may donate funds and assistance towards building a new Hospital by paying money to the supply. Depending on the amount spent ($0, $1, or $2), the player will receive 1, 2, or 3 ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S1_HeartToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and lose 1, 2, or 3 ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(". ");
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("You do not pay extra ($) for placing a piece if another player has already placed at the church.");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("At the end of the Generation, the player with the most ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"S1_HeartToken\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("tokens will gain ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage31_Main()
{

	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It was upon these morning rides that they were able to observe a sudden and peculiar transformation occurring within the town. Crews of hired laborers arrived to clear several of the empty lots in the village and construct new foundations. Within weeks, these vacant lots were filled by nondescript buildings of various purposes.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Armed with an inimitable curiosity and thirst for knowledge, the cousins could not resist further investigation.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.devpage = 0;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage31_Fragment_0()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "Diseases1";
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "S1_LetterBACK";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("All players discard their Letter cards to the box.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.build = this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
	{
		1,
		2,
		3,
		4,
		5
	});
	if (this.Vars.building == "bank")
	{
		this.Vars.build = this.Vars.build - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			2
		});
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.build = this.Vars.build - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			3
		});
	}
	this.Vars.build = this.macros1.shuffled(new StoryVar[]
	{
		(HarloweSpread)this.Vars.build
	});
	this.Vars.buildA = this.Vars.build["1st"];
	this.Vars.buildB = this.Vars.build["2nd"];
	if (this.Vars.building == "bank")
	{
		this.Vars.buildC = 2;
	}
	else if (this.Vars.building == "library")
	{
		this.Vars.buildC = 3;
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.buildC = this.Vars.build["3rd"];
	}
	if (this.Vars.buildA == 1)
	{
		this.Vars.ba = "Hardware Store";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.buildA == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.ba = "Wire Service";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.buildA == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.ba = "Book Store";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.buildA == 4)
	{
		this.Vars.ba = "Warehouse";
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.ba = "Pet Store";
	}
	if (this.Vars.buildB == 1)
	{
		this.Vars.bb = "Hardware Store";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.buildB == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.bb = "Wire Service";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.buildB == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.bb = "Book Store";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.buildB == 4)
	{
		this.Vars.bb = "Warehouse";
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.bb = "Pet Store";
	}
	if (this.Vars.buildC == 1)
	{
		this.Vars.bc = "Hardware Store";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.buildC == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.bc = "Wire Service";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.buildC == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.bc = "Book Store";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.buildC == 4)
	{
		this.Vars.bc = "Warehouse";
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.bc = "Pet Store";
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage33_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Devastation - Middle Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 5;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.devpage == 0 || this.Vars.devpage == "")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "S1_Suspicious_Building";
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Turn to page ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("14");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("of the Village Chronicle. Retrieve the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Suspicious Building");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("tiles, leaving them building side up.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Place a storybook token on the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{

		}

	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text(" Suspicion");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("When a player visits one of the three Suspicious locations, they may investigate the location by secretly picking it up and looking at its reverse side. Then, click on the appropriate location below to choose whether to reveal or conceal the secrets underneath.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00015"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Investigate " + this.Vars.ba.ToString(), null, () => base.enchantHook("h00015", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage33_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		{
			yield return base.link("Investigate " + this.Vars.bb.ToString(), null, () => base.enchantHook("h00016", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage33_Fragment_1), false));
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		{
			yield return base.link("Investigate " + this.Vars.bc.ToString(), null, () => base.enchantHook("h00017", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage33_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		}

		}
		styleScope2 = null;

	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;

	{

		}

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{

		yield return base.link("click here to speak with the Stable Hand.", "RefusalEvent", null);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("If you have joined a faction, this action will have no effect.");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		{
			yield return base.link("Click here at the end of the round for a Special Event...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00000033", HarloweEnchantCommand.None, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage36_Fragment_3), false));
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage34_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("THRIVING IN ADVERSITY - Middle Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 8;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

			yield return base.text(" Board of Trustees");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{
		yield return base.text("All players MUST place their Self on the Hospital space in town once this generation. ");
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("(If, for any reason, you have not visited the Hospital by the end of this Generation, lose 6VP and an Estate Upgrade of your choice, if possible.)");
		}

	styleScope = null;

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.cured == 0)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))

			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;

		}

	if (this.Vars.cured == 1)

	if (this.Vars.trigger35 == 0)
	{
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" Victory Ahead");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;

			yield return base.text("If a player reaches or passes the Storybook token on space 35 of the Victory Point Track, ");
			yield return base.link("click here for a special message", "Trigger35Points", null);
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("The Secret to Immortality");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();

		}

		}

	yield break;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage35_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("THRIVING IN ADVERSITY - Late Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 9;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))

			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;

					yield return base.text("7");
				}

			}
		}
		styleScope = null;

		yield return base.lineBreak();

		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

	if (this.Vars.cured == 1)

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage36_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("THE CRAWL - Middle Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 17;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("PUB");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("If your token is overtaken by the ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(", in addition to visiting the Church you can also visit any Pub. When you visit a Pub marked with a ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and 0 symbol, ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("reset your ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("to zero");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("by buying a couple rounds at the Pub. Then, immediately ");
		yield return base.link("click here for a Bar-venture.", "Barventures", null);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("MASTERWORK");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Masterwork can be completed by taking the Perform Experiment action and paying all of its costs.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Masterwork Recipe");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("To check your Masterwork Cost, ");
		yield return base.link("click here.", "MWTemp", null);
	}

		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();

		yield return base.link("click here to receive your rewards.", "MWCompleteName", null);
	}
	styleScope = null;

			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");

		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage37_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("THE CRAWL - Late Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 18;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.gen3pg == 0 || this.Vars.gen3pg == "")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "Creepy_Icon";
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Remove all ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("tokens from the board. Turn to page ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("9");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("of the Village Chronicle.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.peeps == 1)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Like Us");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("The townspeople express regret for their actions and offer assistance in the family's endeavors.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			this.Vars.ending = "END-NoUniGood";
			yield return base.text("Any player with a token that is not currently overtaken by the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" receives ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("one final Perform Experiment action");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" at the end of this round.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	if (this.Vars.peeps == 0)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("A Step Forward");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("The townspeople begrudgingly accept the conveniences provided by access to electricity and while no apologies are offered, no further actions are taken as retribution.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		this.Vars.ending = "END-NoUniGood";
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("The Power of Electricity");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("During a ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Perform Experiment");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" action, choose a type of Knowledge. ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Ignore that Knowledge type when paying the costs of any B or C-Level Experiment. ");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("For example, if you choose Chemistry and an Experiment card has a 2 Chemistry cost, you pay 0 Chemistry to complete it.");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("PUB");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("If your token is overtaken by the ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(", in addition to visiting the Church you can also visit any Pub. When you visit a Pub marked with a ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and 0 symbol, ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("reset your ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("to zero");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("by buying a couple rounds at the Pub. Then, immediately ");
		yield return base.link("click here for a Bar-venture.", "Barventures", null);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("MASTERWORK");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{

	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

		}

	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

		}

	}

		yield return base.text("My Father's Work");
	}

	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("is a game of Victorian era mad scientist ambition told over three generations. The Storybook App controls the direction of the Town depending on the decisions made by the players. It will require that players interact with it by clicking on specific passages at certain times.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{

	}

	{
		yield return base.text("must");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("click the bottom link to resolve any special events and move play to the next round. The screen will then display the current round and changes to gameplay (if any).");

	yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to return...", "Start2", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;

	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Gain $2.");
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage46_Init()
{
	base.Passages["HubertusWolves1"] = new StoryPassage("HubertusWolves1", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage46_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage46_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.meet == 0 || this.Vars.meet == "")
	{
		yield return base.abort("FailedMeeting");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Carefully pick up the storybook and do not allow any other players to see the screen.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000046"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Once you are ready, click here to reveal your secret conversation.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000046", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage46_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage46_Fragment_0()
{
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameA)
	{
		this.Vars.allyA = "wolves";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameB)
	{
		this.Vars.allyB = "wolves";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameC)
	{
		this.Vars.allyC = "wolves";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameD)
	{
		this.Vars.allyD = "wolves";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameE)
	{
		this.Vars.allyE = "wolves";
	}
	yield return base.abort("HubertusConfirmation");
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage46_Fragment_1()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Upon a Secret Meeting - Letter - ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"April",
			"August",
			"October"
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.random(1.0, 29.0));
		yield return base.text(", 1865");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I, ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.meet);
	yield return base.text(", am writing this letter to you after my meeting with an associate of the International Order of St. Hubertus. Our conversation was brief, but the resulting knowledge has piqued my curiosities.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It has been revealed to me that your intentions are ");
	if (this.Vars.wolves == "evil")
	{
		yield return base.text("nefarious. The malevolent Order is consumed with greed, seeking to unearth the ancient secrets in this area and use this power to alter humanity and spread a plague of monstrous entities across the world. You only asked for your work to remain ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("concealed");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(".");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("demonstrably positive. The Order is only concerned with establishing a safe haven for those afflicted by disease. Your representative even revealed a physical peculiarity that had elongated her cuspids into sharp points. She left swiftly before nightfall, ignoring my pleas for her to remain, but she urged me to ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("investigate");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" the secret workings soon to become apparent.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Being intimately familiar with matters of the occult, this admission is unsurprising. My apprehensions are only related to how your actions will impact my ability to advance my scientific studies most generously.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("It is with sincerity that I:");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("...have decided to ");
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00020"))
	{
		yield return base.link("join and pledge my service to your cause.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00020", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage46_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("...have decided to ");
	yield return base.link("refuse this ridiculous offer.", "RefusalWolves", null);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage47_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Moon Sickness");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.round == 13)
	{
		yield return base.text("What a horrible night to have a curse!");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("They wrote of torn clothing, strange awakenings half-naked in the gardens at the edge of their Estate, of blood speckled about their boots and dried streaks from the corners of their lips. Lingering lucid memories of stalking prey in the woods haunted their dreams yet filled them with a terrible energy!");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("When they discovered the eviscerated body of one of their servants skewered upon the metal fence that lined the grounds, the bestial teeth and claw marks told a new story. They steeled their mind against the distraction, recommitting themselves with deadly focus to the task at hand.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0004701"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0004701", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage47_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("They could not dwell on the news of yet another victim within their household for long as more pressing matters of scientific import weighed upon their every waking hour. ");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("For theirs was a dismal, macabre occupation. They measured each moment in dark pen strokes, the incision of a sterilized blade, or the ebullition of glowing liquid in a graduated flask. The loss of a servant was unfortunate, not for the life it represented, but for the distinct lapse in efficiency procuring a new servant would cause.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0004703"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0004703", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage47_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage48_Init()
{
	base.Passages["bar1"] = new StoryPassage("bar1", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage48_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage48_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("SWORN STATEMENT - Case ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.random(1.0, 999.0));
		yield return base.text(" -HDG- ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.random(1.0, 999.0));
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.bar1 = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		1,
		2
	});
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.bar1 == 1)
	{
		yield return base.text("After a brief excursion to the local pub, I happened to engage in a spirited conversation with the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Blacksmiths");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" son. Being slightly out of my wits, his slightly improper offer to accompany him home to his chateau for further libations appealed. We engaged in a delightful conversation, so intriguing in fact, that I accepted his generous offer of temporary lodging for the evening. I will spare the details of our respectable and entirely benign conversation.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("We both decided to disrobe as any person would when making nightly preparations for sleep. Regrettably, though I cannot recollect how it occurred, the Blacksmith was unpleased to discover us similarly nude and entwined in this state the next morning, surrounded by several defiled tools from the forge. Our familys reputation was certainly sullied at the Blacksmith and I resolved to avoid it in the future.");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("After a brief excursion to the local pub, I happened to engage in a spirited conversation with the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Blacksmiths");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" daughter. While I am unable to discern the reasoning behind my actions, I have since apologized for my repeated comments besmirching her virtuous nature; comments which apparently resulted in a minor altercation with a gentlemen or two at the fine establishment.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("It was around midnight that I decided to make a quiet exit, in order to properly avoid any further antagonism. My clothes, soiled and bloodied by the ensuing brawl, were found discarded along the muddy trek to the Blacksmith's forge. While I have no recollection of the ensuing events, multiple witnesses attest that I then proceeded to brand the blacksmith's dog and passed out naked in the slack tub. Our familys reputation was certainly sullied at the Blacksmith and I resolved to avoid it in the future.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "Creepy_Icon";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Place a ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token on the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Blacksmith");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(". When a player takes an action at this location, they ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("gain 1 ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("for every ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token on that location.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{

		yield return base.text(this.macros1.random(1.0, 999.0));

	{
		1,
		2
	});
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.bar2 == 1)
	{
		yield return base.text("While many first-hand accounts from the townsfolk may not corroborate my story, I cannot conceal my disgust with the insinuation. The stable hand and I were simply enjoying a midnight ride in the nearby beet fields in the spirit of the season. 		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("I awoke in the stables beside my porcine companion, who had been outfitted with a leather riding saddle. The gate to their pen had been left open and the entire pig population of the town was scattered throughout the streets.");

		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("I would also like to note that the charges of public nudity against me are warrantless, as upon discovery of my predicament that morning, I hastily endeavored to hide my shame and purchase new clothing from a local tailor as would be customary in such a situation. 		{
			yield return base.text("Farmers Market");
		}
		styleScope = null;

	else
	{
