		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("While I admit to having a few additional libations, it is most presumptuous to believe that just because I was found near the open door of my carriage in the buff, covered in tomato paste, with lipstick impressions across the entirety of my form, that I would be held responsible for the debasing of a bushel of cherry tomatoes and several other vegetable stocks.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Despite my personal objections, I have summarily reimbursed the stall owner for their produce and discretion in the matter. Our familys reputation was certainly sullied at the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Farmers Market");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" and I resolved to avoid it in the future.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "Creepy_Icon";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Place a ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token on the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Farmer's Market");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;

		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("gain 1 ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("for every ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token on that location.");

		{
			yield return base.text("Fortune Teller");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" and I resolved to avoid it in the future.");

		}

private void passage51_Init()
{
	base.Passages["bar4"] = new StoryPassage("bar4", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage51_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage51_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("SWORN STATEMENT - Case ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.random(1.0, 999.0));
		yield return base.text("-HDG-");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.random(1.0, 999.0));
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.bar4 = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		1,
		2
	});
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.bar4 == 1)
	{
		yield return base.text("The celebration had been exceedingly rowdy. I could not recall whose birthday or anniversary was being celebrated, but I could remember my celebratory stilted walk to the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("General Store");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" near midnight. In my admittedly intoxicated state, I required sustenance.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Unfortunately, my hunger pangs may have overtaken my sensibilities. A rock may have been plunged through the front window, and I may have been discovered the next morning by the constabulary, passed out naked on the wooden floor, surrounded by several empty cartons of canned sardines, the contents of which may have been returned to the same general area in a more semi-digested form. Our familys reputation was certainly sullied at the General Store and I resolved to avoid it in the future.");
	}
	if (this.Vars.bar4 == 2)
	{
		yield return base.text("The proprietors of the General Store, Hagen and Mabel Varga, are respectable, upstanding citizens of whom I have a deep respect. Their fine emporium of quality products is a grand example of successful private business ownership that positively serves the community.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("My unfortunate public statements to the contrary in a loud and admittedly inebriated state were categorically untrue and misinformed. My subsequent scrawling of expletives upon their business' front window - with a crude writing medium that I will not elaborate upon - was brash and reckless.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("I regret that my nude form was discovered curled up at their doorstep by the constabulary. Our familys reputation was certainly sullied at the General Store and I resolved to avoid it in the future.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "Creepy_Icon";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Place a ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token on the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("General Store");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(". When a player takes an action at this location, they ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("gain 1 ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("for every ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token on that location.");
	}

	yield break;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage52_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

		yield return base.text("SWORN STATEMENT - Case ");

		yield return base.text("-HDG-");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.random(1.0, 999.0));
	}

	{
		1,
		2
	});
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.bar5 == 1)
	{
		yield return base.text("I vaguely remember the phrase that began the argument, but the stitches above my left eye from a shattered glass mug jogged my recollection of the ensuing brawl. A quick nightcap turned into an extended stay of tumbled barstools, belligerence, and wild accusations. My injuries must have been extensive as my memory ceased soon after.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("My displeased spouse informed me that I was currently the height of gossip within the town. First-hand accounts - of which I cannot confirm given my state of awareness - described how I spat blood in a nurses face, tore off my leggings (and undergarments), tried to punch the vicar thrice, and defiled myself in the lobby. Our familys reputation was certainly sullied at the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Hospital");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" and I resolved to avoid it in the future.");
	}
	if (this.Vars.bar5 == 2)
	{
		yield return base.text("I should not have attempted to perform a surgical procedure in my state. Nor should I have locked myself in the surgical arena with a patient, barred the door, and undressed, dousing myself in a carbolic acid solution for the purposes of sterilization. However, my honor had been questioned at the pub and I deemed it only necessary to demonstrate my surgical prowess.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The demonstration of my experimentation capabilities - which are normally formidable, I might add - turned into a series of unfortunate mishaps and misunderstandings. The unfortunate patient has since made a full recovery and has already received a generous stipend in recompense and the hospital a donation with which to cleanse the arena of the admittedly large quantity of blood on the walls, seating, instruments, and ceiling. Our familys reputation was certainly sullied at the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Hospital");
		}
		styleScope = null;

		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "Creepy_Icon";

		}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage58_Fragment_0()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = ((this.Vars.round == 7) ? "Hospital1" : ((this.Vars.round == 8) ? "Hospital2" : "Hospital3"));
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "S1_Pancea";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Gain ");
			yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
			{
				2,
				3,
				4
			}));
			yield return base.text("VP.");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("Also, Gain ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("1");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(".");

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage60_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("\"April Fools Day\" - Journal Entry - 1882");
		if (this.Vars.panacure == this.Vars.nameA)
		{
			this.Vars.tempjournal = this.Vars.nameB;
		}
		else
		{
			this.Vars.tempjournal = this.Vars.nameA;
		}
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.tempjournal);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("Jr.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It was a fine summer morning when I heard a piercing scream from the garden. While I had grown relatively accustomed to this cry of distress in my experimentations, it was decidedly peculiar to hear the sound over morning coffee and crepes.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("After sashing my robe about me, I exited the manor in time to witness the final moments of a servant tending to the trimming. With a quick lurch, they turned towards me, now beyond sound as their facial features collapsed inwardly. Sanguine chunks of flesh fell to the ground and sizzled like bacon grease on the grass. Within seconds, the human figure that once tended to our garden was a sloshy pile of pink and white froth on the lawn and whatever substance had caused it had seeped deep into the ground, creating a considerable hole in the landscaping.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I took a sip of coffee and examined a nearby glass vial labeled as \"vital elixir for use in the prevention of disease.\" I recognized our dear cousin's penmanship instantly; the prankster!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("However, unfortunately, another servant stood slack-jawed near the gate, having witnessed the entire spectacle. It would be difficult to replace this worker.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000060"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000060", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage60_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage61_Init()
{
	base.Passages["SymposiumEvent3"] = new StoryPassage("SymposiumEvent3", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage61_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage61_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The Fate of the Lecture Series");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If it amounted to anything, those in attendance were certainly astonished by the eccentricities witnessed that day. Some weaker-willed individuals were prone to nausea and fainting spells during the speeches, clearly in deference to the astounding breadth of visionary experimentation.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("But, were their efforts enough to sway the most notable scientific minds of the time?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("SYMPOSIUM RESULT");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Add up the total number of ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.sci3);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("Experiments completed by ALL players.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If the total is less than ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.symp);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(", ");
	yield return base.link("click here.", "SymposiumFail", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If the total is equal to or greater than ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.symp);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(", ");
	yield return base.link("click here...", "SymposiumMiddle", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("However, if the total is equal to or greater than ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		if (this.Vars.players == 2)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.symp + 2);
		}
		else if (this.Vars.players == 3)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.symp + 2);
		}
		else if (this.Vars.players == 4)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.symp + 3);
		}
		else if (this.Vars.players == 5)
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.symp + 4);
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.symp + 2);
		}
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(", ");
	yield return base.link("click here instead.", "SymposiumSuccess", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage64_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.society == "Order of St. Hubertus")
	{
		if (this.Vars.hcount == 0)
		{
			yield return base.abort("EvilWolvesEventStart");
		}
		else
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Despite the Hunters' Loss");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope = null;
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("It was during a period of adjustment to their new surroundings that customary preparations were made to redecorate the west wing of the manor in a more modern style to which they were accustomed. Expecting a delivery of druggets from a Persian carpeter, instead they were greeted by a strapping young man in a burgundy leather coat. He tipped his wide-brimmed hat solemnly.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("\"Your family has made a contribution to our Fraternity and we are here to repay that debt through service,\" the young man stated, pulling back his shirt sleeve to reveal a tattoo of a bow and arrow. He then exited to the servant's quarters without further instruction.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			if (this.Vars.allyA != "hunters" && this.Vars.allyB != "hunters" && this.Vars.allyC != "hunters" && this.Vars.allyD != "hunters")
			{
				yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "EvilWolvesEventStart", null);
			}
			else
			{
				using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0006401"))
				{
					yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0006401", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage64_Fragment_0), false));
				}
				styleScope = null;
			}
		}
	}
	else if (this.Vars.wcount == 0)
	{
		yield return base.abort("TaxesEventStart");
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Despite the wolves' Loss");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("It was during a period of adjustment to their new surroundings that customary preparations were made to redecorate the west wing of the manor in a more modern style to which they were accustomed. Expecting a delivery of druggets from a Turkish carpeter, instead they were greeted by a strapping young man in a gray cloak. He tipped his fur cap solemnly.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("\"Your family has made a contribution to our Order and we are here to repay that debt through service,\" the young man stated, pulling back his shirt sleeve to reveal a tattoo of a wolf's head. He then exited to the servant's quarters without further instruction.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.Vars.allyA != "wolves" && this.Vars.allyB != "wolves" && this.Vars.allyC != "wolves" && this.Vars.allyD != "wolves")
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue.", "TaxesEventStart", null);
		}
		else
		{
			using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0006403"))
			{
				yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0006403", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage64_Fragment_2), false));
			}
			styleScope = null;
		}
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage64_Fragment_2()
{
	ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "TaxesEventStart";
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "GainServantFromLost";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.Vars.allyA == "wolves")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
			yield return base.text(" III ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("immediately gains 1 Servant from Lost and $1");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.allyB == "wolves")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
			yield return base.text(" III ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("immediately gains 1 Servant from Lost and $1");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.allyC == "wolves")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameC);
			yield return base.text(" III ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("immediately gains 1 Servant from Lost and $1");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.allyD == "wolves")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameD);
			yield return base.text(" III ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("immediately gains 1 Servant from Lost and $1");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.allyE == "wolves")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameE);
			yield return base.text(" III ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("immediately gains 1 Servant from Lost and $1");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.allyA != "wolves" && this.Vars.allyB != "wolves" && this.Vars.allyC != "wolves" && this.Vars.allyD != "wolves")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
			yield return base.text(" III ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("immediately gains 1 Servant from Lost and $1");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage71_Init()
{
	base.Passages["Lettercode"] = new StoryPassage("Lettercode", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage71_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage71_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Surprising Correspondence");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("As the welcome from the townspeople was considerably icy, the cousins were amused to receive a plain letter of correspondence sealed with wax. No return address was provided and no watermarks offered evidence as to their origin. Perhaps this mystery, they surmised, would afford them more than simple seclusion in this dreary countryside.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Little did they realize how instrumental this stealthful exchange would prove over the next several decades.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000071"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000071", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage71_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.letterSetRandomize == 0 || this.Vars.letterSetRandomize == "")
	{
		this.Vars.letter = this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			1,
			2,
			3,
			4,
			5,
			6
		});
		this.Vars.letter = this.macros1.shuffled(new StoryVar[]
		{
			(HarloweSpread)this.Vars.letter
		});
		this.Vars.pa = this.Vars.letter["1st"];
		this.Vars.pb = this.Vars.letter["2nd"];
		this.Vars.pc = this.Vars.letter["3rd"];
		this.Vars.pd = this.Vars.letter["4th"];
		this.Vars.pe = this.Vars.letter["5th"];
	}
	if (this.Vars.pa == 1)
	{
		this.Vars.let1 = this.Vars.nameA;
	}
	if (this.Vars.pa == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.let2 = this.Vars.nameA;
	}
	if (this.Vars.pa == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.let3 = this.Vars.nameA;
	}
	if (this.Vars.pa == 4)
	{
		this.Vars.let4 = this.Vars.nameA;
	}
	if (this.Vars.pa == 5)
	{
		this.Vars.let5 = this.Vars.nameA;
	}
	if (this.Vars.pa == 6)
	{
		this.Vars.let6 = this.Vars.nameA;
	}
	if (this.Vars.pb == 1)
	{
		this.Vars.let1 = this.Vars.nameB;
	}
	if (this.Vars.pb == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.let2 = this.Vars.nameB;
	}
	if (this.Vars.pb == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.let3 = this.Vars.nameB;
	}
	if (this.Vars.pb == 4)
	{
		this.Vars.let4 = this.Vars.nameB;
	}
	if (this.Vars.pb == 5)
	{
		this.Vars.let5 = this.Vars.nameB;
	}
	if (this.Vars.pb == 6)
	{
		this.Vars.let6 = this.Vars.nameB;
	}
	if (this.Vars.pc == 1)
	{
		this.Vars.let1 = ((this.Vars.players == 3) ? this.Vars.nameC : this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			this.Vars.nameA,
			this.Vars.nameB
		}));
	}
	if (this.Vars.pc == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.let2 = ((this.Vars.players == 3) ? this.Vars.nameC : this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			this.Vars.nameA,
			this.Vars.nameB
		}));
	}
	if (this.Vars.pc == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.let3 = ((this.Vars.players == 3) ? this.Vars.nameC : this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage74_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Good or Evil Intent");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("As they entered their twilight years, the results of the family's investigative efforts became known. The town, no longer in complete poverty, began to attract new interest from those with both genuine and nefarious motivations. The true intent of the family members was revealed.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.gen3pg = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.exposeA > 0)
	{
		this.Vars.goodcount = int.Parse(this.Vars.goodcount) + 1;
		yield return base.text("The evil activities of the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.ba);

		{
			yield return base.text("thwarted");
		}

		yield return base.text(" tile to the side of the play area within reach.");

		if (this.Vars.pAA == "yes")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);

		}

		}

		}

			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.pEA == "yes")

		}
	}

		}

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.exposeB > 0)
	{

			yield return base.text("thwarted");
		}

		yield return base.text(this.Vars.bb);
		yield return base.text(" tile to the side of the play area within reach.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.Vars.pAB == "yes")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
			yield return base.text(" gains 3VP for Exposing the threat.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.pBB == "yes")
		{

			yield return base.lineBreak();

			yield return base.text(" gains 3VP for Exposing the threat.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();

			yield return base.text(" gains 3VP for Exposing the threat.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();

		}

		yield return base.text(this.Vars.bb);
		yield return base.text(" were ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("successful");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" because of our collective efforts to obscure and conceal. Place the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.bb);
		yield return base.text(" tile to the side of the play area within reach.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.exposeC > 0)
	{
		this.Vars.goodcount = int.Parse(this.Vars.goodcount) + 1;
		yield return base.text("The evil activities of the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.bc);
		yield return base.text(" were ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("thwarted");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" by our efforts. Place the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.bc);
		yield return base.text(" tile to the side of the play area within reach.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.Vars.pAC == "yes")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
			yield return base.text(" gains 3VP for Exposing the threat.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.pBC == "yes")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
			yield return base.text(" gains 3VP for Exposing the threat.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.pCC == "yes")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameC);
			yield return base.text(" gains 3VP for Exposing the threat.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.pDC == "yes")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameD);
			yield return base.text(" gains 3VP for Exposing the threat.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.pEC == "yes")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameE);
			yield return base.text(" gains 3VP for Exposing the threat.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("The evil activities of the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.bc);
		yield return base.text(" were ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("successful");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" because of our collective efforts to obscure and conceal. Place the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.bc);
		yield return base.text(" tile to the side of the play area within reach.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "MostInvestigated", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage75_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.playtxt = "two";
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.playtxt = "three";
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 4)
	{
		this.Vars.playtxt = "four";
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 5)
	{
		this.Vars.playtxt = "five";
	}
	yield return base.text("As siblings of an influential family of Eastern European descent, the ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.playtxt);
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("of us have received a not-insignificant portion of our family's estate.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Before we begin, let us make this historical fiction more engaging by providing our names.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "NameEntryA", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();

It had not only left the previous generation in shambles, but imbued the townsfolk with a profound, insatiable fear, even as the town returned to relative stability. During the day, the people watched the forests, glimpsing dark shadows flitting between the trees. At night, they steeled themselves against the wailing howls of unseen terrors, dreading that their children would be stolen away from their beds.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

They clutched crossbows, whips, and daggers freshly glimmering with crimson fluid. Their blood-stained attire and steel-eyed gaze evoked the undaunted presence of ones who had peered into the void and returned forever changed.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Their stated goal: to slay every last beast in the land and return those who had unleashed this foul plague back to the depths of hell from whence they came. 	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("While they did not require monetary compensation in return, what they did ask was much more severe. Their sanguine efforts could not be completed in isolation, so on nights when the blood moon rose high in the evening sky, a handful of townsfolk were chosen to assist the Hunters' party and venture into the unknown. The next morning, the surviving Hunters would return, their garments speckled in the blood of the beasts and holding aloft the severed trophies of monsters slain in the wilderness. It was only a matter of time before they would call upon the family.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Perhaps driven by a sense of limited time or jealousy over the Hunters' ability to frighten the townsfolk even moreso than their own actions, the cousins continued their meticulous labors in earnest. However, they were deeply unaware of just how intertwined their fates would be to the Fraternity.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "HuntersHUBcode", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	this.Vars.huntcount = 0;
	this.Vars.gen3pg = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage86_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GENERATION II:");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The Epidemic Strikes");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Following a bitter winter in 1862, a second epidemic descended upon the village in all its visceral and bloody force. This time, however, the town was unable to recover. Buildings were left to rot as the sick fled into the countryside. Some escaped to shelter in camps near Bucharest, while the less fortunate collapsed on the icy pathways along the journey, their frozen flesh left to thaw along muddy roadsides with the change of seasons. Lost and hopeless without aid, the town dwindled until only the barest of amenities remained.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The desolation to which the family returned was unlike anything they had experienced in their short lifetime and the joys of youthful marriage were swiftly eclipsed by the reality of disease. Those who had stubbornly refused to join the others in mass exodus burned incense in their homes to prevent miasmatic transference of the fever; a practice quickly adopted within the family's estates. For years, the ominous tintinnabulation echoed across the stricken valley each night to ward off the disease even as the cemetery was inundated with new bodies.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("For most, this environment of sullen quiet and isolation would cause one to question their sanity, but for the scientists, this time was marked by a signature productivity. Perhaps the thought of redemption drove them forward or the constant reminder of their own mortality with each passing moment. Either way, they each toiled away in their studies, confident that through tragedy their family's legacy would finally be secured forever in the annals of science!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("And the country began to take notice of their activities; though not in the academic manner which they anticipated. Shadowy figures kept their watchful eye on the region with mysterious intentions. Unaware of the sinister machinations afoot, the scientists blindly immersed themselves in their work. They would soon find themselves confronted by a choice that would rock the very foundations of scientific (and rational) thought as they understood it.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Continue...", "DiseaseConsequence", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.letter = this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
	{
		1,
		2,
		3,
		4,
		5
	});
	this.Vars.letter = this.macros1.shuffled(new StoryVar[]
	{
		(HarloweSpread)this.Vars.letter
	});
	this.Vars.letterA = this.Vars.letter["1st"];
	this.Vars.letterB = this.Vars.letter["2nd"];
	this.Vars.letterC = this.Vars.letter["3rd"];
	this.Vars.letA = 0;
	this.Vars.letB = 0;
	this.Vars.letC = 0;
	this.Vars.goodcount = 0;
	this.Vars.refusaltoken = "no";
	this.Vars.sick = 0;
	this.Vars.devpage = 0;
	this.Vars.let1 = 0;
	this.Vars.let2 = 0;
	this.Vars.let3 = 0;
	this.Vars.let4 = 0;
	this.Vars.let5 = 0;
	this.Vars.let6 = 0;
	this.Vars.wcount = 0;
	this.Vars.hcount = 0;
	this.Vars.gen3pg = 0;
	this.Vars.allyA = 0;
	this.Vars.allyB = 0;
	this.Vars.allyC = 0;
	this.Vars.allyD = 0;
	this.Vars.allyE = 0;
	this.Vars.most = 0;
	this.Vars.playA = 0;
	this.Vars.playB = 0;
	this.Vars.playC = 0;
	this.Vars.playD = 0;
	this.Vars.playE = 0;
	this.Vars.exposeA = 0;
	this.Vars.exposeB = 0;
	this.Vars.exposeC = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage89_Init()
{
	base.Passages["Immortality"] = new StoryPassage("Immortality", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage89_Main));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage89_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Overcoming Death");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If not now, then when? The cousins pored over this question. How long would they remain relegated to an eccentric footnote murmured amongst the townspeople? Why must they toil in their most important labors under the cover of darkness and stone like vermin? A deep restlessness had set into the minds of each, and even on the cusp of approval from the academic community, they could not quell these thoughts.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It was trivial to discuss meager experimentations when the solidification of such a poignant legacy repeated fruitlessly generation upon generation. If only time was no longer an obstacle.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("They vowed to accumulate a wealth of knowledge in their fields of expertise that far surpassed the pitiable ruminations of ancient scholars. Perhaps if they pushed forward into the unknown they would harness new and untold powers. Their evening conversations spurred them to devise a way to cheat the most sacred and inevitable truth of existence.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("For if life can be taken and altered by humanity into its most cruel and twisted form, surely that same spark could be endlessly preserved!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000089"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000089", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage89_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage89_Fragment_0()
{
	ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = ((this.Vars.seedy == "no") ? "Gen1Creepy-RefuseBonus" : ((this.Vars.seedy == "yes") ? "Gen1Creepy-AgreedReturn" : "Hospital2"));
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "StorybookToken";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Give each player a ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("token");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(".");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Each player chooses an incomplete track of their choice in their Journal and places their ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token on the third level of that track.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield break;
	yield break;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage90_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.round == 16)
	{
		yield return base.abort("NoUni2");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.round == 17)
	{
		yield return base.abort("NoUni3");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.round == 19)
	{
		yield return base.abort("University2");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("University3");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage97_Fragment_0()
{
	ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "UniEquity";
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "GainCaretakerFromLost";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.Vars.lifeA == "yes")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
			yield return base.text(" retrieves a Caretaker piece from lost.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.lifeB == "yes")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
			yield return base.text(" retrieves a Caretaker piece from lost.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.lifeC == "yes")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameC);
			yield return base.text(" retrieves a Caretaker piece from lost.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.lifeD == "yes")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameD);
			yield return base.text(" retrieves a Caretaker piece from lost.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.lifeE == "yes")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameE);
			yield return base.text(" retrieves a Caretaker piece from lost.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.lifeA != "yes" && this.Vars.lifeB != "yes" && this.Vars.lifeC != "yes" && this.Vars.lifeD != "yes" && this.Vars.lifeE != "yes")
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
			yield return base.text(" retrieves a Caretaker piece from lost.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Any player who did not receive a Caretaker for Immortality ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Loses 2 ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("(2 spaces to the left)");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("at the start of this Generation.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

{

	{

		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;

		yield return base.lineBreak();

private void passage99_Init()
{
	base.Passages["S5HospA1"] = new StoryPassage("S5HospA1", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage99_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage99_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.S5HospA1nextPsg == "" || this.Vars.S5HospA1nextPsg == 0)
	{
		if (this.Vars.players == 2)
		{
			if (this.Vars.life >= int.Parse(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
			{
				1,
				2
			})))
			{
				this.Vars.S5HospA1nextPsg = "S5HospA1Yes";
			}
			else
			{
				this.Vars.S5HospA1nextPsg = "S5HospA1No";
			}
		}
		else if (this.Vars.players == 3)
		{
			if (this.Vars.life >= 2)
			{
				this.Vars.S5HospA1nextPsg = "S5HospA1Yes";
			}
			else
			{
				this.Vars.S5HospA1nextPsg = "S5HospA1No";
			}
		}
		else if (this.Vars.players == 4)
		{
			if (this.Vars.life >= int.Parse(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
			{
				2,
				3
			})))
			{
				this.Vars.S5HospA1nextPsg = "S5HospA1Yes";
			}
			else
			{
				this.Vars.S5HospA1nextPsg = "S5HospA1No";
			}
		}
		else if (this.Vars.players == 5)
		{
			if (this.Vars.life >= int.Parse(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
			{
				2,
				3,
				4
			})))
			{
				this.Vars.S5HospA1nextPsg = "S5HospA1Yes";
			}
			else
			{
				this.Vars.S5HospA1nextPsg = "S5HospA1No";
			}
		}
		else
		{
			this.Vars.S5HospA1nextPsg = "S5HospA1No";
		}
	}
	yield return base.abort(this.Vars.S5HospA1nextPsg);
	yield break;
}

private void passage100_Init()
{
	base.Passages["S5HospA1No"] = new StoryPassage("S5HospA1No", new string[]
	{
		"END"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage100_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage100_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Death Becomes Us");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	string arg = "Remove all player pieces from the board and perform the End of a Generation. Any <sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0> tokens remaining on a player's Journal Track are returned to the supply.";
	Action<string, int> s_OnEndOfGeneration = ViewEndOfGeneration.S_OnEndOfGeneration;
	if (s_OnEndOfGeneration != null)
	{
		s_OnEndOfGeneration(arg, 6);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("As their bodies withered with time, the failures of their equally outdated scientific pursuits weighed heavily on their deteriorating minds. With only ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.life);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("of them discovering the way towards ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("immortality");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(", the cousins wallowed in their own ineptitude.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.uni == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.text("With no further push from its energetic benefactors, the university was shunned, abandoned, and refitted.");
		yield return base.text(" ");
	}
	yield return base.text("With no sounds of screams and explosions echoing down from the hillsides, the townsfolk lost their sense of purpose. A thick fog of ignorance fell across the populace as they returned to the old ways with a righteous fervor.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue to a more depressing time...", "RippedMasterwork", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage102_Init()
{
	base.Passages["EnvPasscode"] = new StoryPassage("EnvPasscode", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage102_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage102_Main()
{
	if (this.ispopup && this.ispasscode)
	{
		this.ispopup = false;
		this.ispasscode = false;
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.OnGenerationBtn("EnvPasscode", "Enter the secret password on your envelope.", "string", 0.25f);
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.password = ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueString();
		Debug.Log("password check : " + this.Vars.password);
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		this.ispopup = true;
		yield return base.abort("Passcodechk");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
}

		this.Vars.allyA = "wolves";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameB)
	{
		this.Vars.allyB = "wolves";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameC)
	{
		this.Vars.allyC = "wolves";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameD)
	{
		this.Vars.allyD = "wolves";

		this.Vars.allyE = "wolves";

	yield break;

{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Upon a Secret Meeting - Letter - ");

		{
			"April",
			"August",
			"October"
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.random(1.0, 29.0));
		yield return base.text(", 1865");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I, ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.meet);
	yield return base.text(", am writing this letter to you after my meeting with an associate of the International Order of St. Hubertus. Our conversation was brief, but the resulting knowledge has piqued my curiosities.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It has been revealed to me that your intentions are ");
	if (this.Vars.wolves == "evil")
	{
		yield return base.text("nefarious. The malevolent Order is consumed with greed, seeking to unearth the ancient secrets in this area and use this power to alter humanity and spread a plague of monstrous entities across the world. You only asked for your work to remain ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("concealed");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(".");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.wolves == "good")
	{
		yield return base.text("demonstrably positive. The Order is only concerned with establishing a safe haven for those afflicted by disease. Your representative even revealed a physical peculiarity that had elongated her cuspids into sharp points. She left swiftly before nightfall, ignoring my pleas for her to remain, but she urged me to ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("investigate");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" the secret workings soon to become apparent.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Being intimately familiar with matters of the occult, this admission is unsurprising. My apprehensions are only related to how your actions will impact my ability to advance my scientific studies most generously.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("It is with sincerity that I:");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("...have decided to ");
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00040"))
	{
		yield return base.link("join and pledge my service to your cause.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00040", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage103_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("...have decided to ");
	yield return base.link("refuse this ridiculous offer.", "RefusalWolves", null);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	if (this.Vars.wolves == "evil")
	{
		yield return base.text("nefarious. The malevolent Order is consumed with greed, seeking to unearth the ancient secrets in this area and use this power to alter humanity and spread a plague of monstrous entities across the world. You only asked for your work to remain ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("concealed");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(".");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("demonstrably positive. The Order is only concerned with establishing a safe haven for those afflicted by disease. Your representative even revealed a physical peculiarity that had elongated her cuspids into sharp points. She left swiftly before nightfall, ignoring my pleas for her to remain, but she urged me to ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("investigate");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" the secret workings soon to become apparent.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Being intimately familiar with matters of the occult, this admission is unsurprising. My apprehensions are only related to how your actions will impact my ability to advance my scientific studies most generously.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("It is with sincerity that I:");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("...have decided to ");
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00041"))
	{
		yield return base.link("join and pledge my service to your cause.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00041", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage105_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("...have decided to ");
	yield return base.link("refuse this ridiculous offer.", "RefusalWolves", null);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage106_Fragment_1()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Upon a Secret Meeting - Letter - ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"April",
			"August",
			"October"
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.random(1.0, 29.0));
		yield return base.text(", 1865");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I, ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.meet);
	yield return base.text(", am writing this letter to you after my meeting with an associate of the International Fraternity of Hunters. Our secret conversation over brunch was quite revealing, and the resulting knowledge has piqued my interests.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It has been revealed to me that your intentions are ");
	if (this.Vars.hunters == "evil")
	{
		yield return base.text("amusingly exploitative. The Fraternity hopes to use the recent epidemic as a cover for their activities to unearth ancient supernatural secrets in the region and use them for monetary and political gain. Although I remain skeptical, if these labors are successful, I will be deeply interested in the results. You only asked for your work to remain ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("concealed");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(".");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("good. It was astute for you to note how oddly silent the town has remained over the last few years. Keeping a watchful eye over the proceedings, the Fraternity appears only concerned with rooting out who or what is behind this veil of secrecy. You've urged me to ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("investigate");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" the secret workings soon to become apparent.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Being an entrepreneur myself, in a fashion, these goals are not so misaligned with my own. My apprehensions are only related to how your actions will impact my ability to advance my scientific studies most generously.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("It is with sincerity that I:");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("...have decided to ");
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00042"))
	{
		yield return base.link("join and pledge my service to your cause.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00042", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage106_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("...have decided to ");
	yield return base.link("refuse this ridiculous offer.", "RefusalHunters", null);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	{
		"END"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage107_Main));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage107_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Strong Alliance");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	string arg = "Remove all player pieces from the board and Perform the End of a Generation. Return any remaining <sprite=\"StorybookToken\" index=0> tokens to the supply.";
	Action<string, int> s_OnEndOfGeneration = ViewEndOfGeneration.S_OnEndOfGeneration;
	if (s_OnEndOfGeneration != null)
	{
		s_OnEndOfGeneration(arg, 6);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The ties that bound the family to these secret warring factions changed the course of history.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.society == "Fraternity of Hunters")
	{
		if (this.Vars.hunters == "evil")
		{
			yield return base.text("While secrets could not forever be kept, the silent assistance of ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.playtxt);
			yield return base.text(" influential members of the upper crust ensured that the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Hunters");
			}
			styleScope = null;
			yield return base.text(" could progress in their endeavors long enough to make their presence integral to the town. For a price, they swore to protect all citizens from the disease and darkness that had enveloped the countryside.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "HelpingEvil", null);
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.text("By exposing the nefarious work of the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Order of St. Hubertus,");
			}
			styleScope = null;
			yield return base.text(" the additional attention forced them to leave the region. Motivated by the promise of swift justice, the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Fraternity of Hunters");
			}
			styleScope = null;
			yield return base.text(" created a stronghold in the town. They swore at all costs to protect the town from the evils that roamed the land.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "ProsperityHunterIntro", null);
		}
	}
	else if (this.Vars.wolves == "evil")
	{
		yield return base.text("While secrets could not forever be kept, the silent assistance of ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.playtxt);
		yield return base.text(" influential members of the upper crust ensured that the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Order");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" could progress in their endeavors long enough to make their presence integral to the town. They immediately began to advance their schemes.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "HelpingEvil", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("By exposing the insidious deeds of the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Fraternity of Hunters,");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" the additional attention forced them to quit the region. Motivated by the promise of swift justice, the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Order of St. Hubertus");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" created a stronghold in the town. They swore to provide a haven for all outcasts.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "ProsperityWolvesIntro", null);
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage110_Init()
{
	base.Passages["Passcodechk"] = new StoryPassage("Passcodechk", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage110_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage110_Main()
{
	Debug.Log("Password ::: " + this.Vars.password);
	if (this.Vars.password == "alpha")
	{
		this.Vars.meet = this.Vars.let1;
		yield return base.abort("HubertusWolves1");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.password == "moon")
	{
		this.Vars.meet = this.Vars.let2;
		yield return base.abort("HubertusWolves2");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.password == "howl")
	{
		this.Vars.meet = this.Vars.let3;
		yield return base.abort("HubertusWolves3");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.password == "right")
	{
		this.Vars.meet = this.Vars.let4;
		yield return base.abort("HubertusHunters1");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.password == "cross")
	{
		this.Vars.meet = this.Vars.let5;
		yield return base.abort("HubertusHunters2");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.password == "bolt")
	{
		this.Vars.meet = this.Vars.let6;
		yield return base.abort("HubertusHunters3");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.password == "Alpha")
	{
		this.Vars.meet = this.Vars.let1;
		yield return base.abort("HubertusWolves1");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.password == "Moon")
	{
		this.Vars.meet = this.Vars.let2;
		yield return base.abort("HubertusWolves2");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.password == "Howl")
	{
		this.Vars.meet = this.Vars.let3;
		yield return base.abort("HubertusWolves3");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.password == "Right")
	{
		this.Vars.meet = this.Vars.let4;
		yield return base.abort("HubertusHunters1");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.password == "Cross")
	{
		this.Vars.meet = this.Vars.let5;
		yield return base.abort("HubertusHunters2");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.password == "Bolt")
	{
		this.Vars.meet = this.Vars.let6;
		yield return base.abort("HubertusHunters3");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("FailedMeeting");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
}

private void passage111_Init()
{
	base.Passages["BuildingSignin"] = new StoryPassage("BuildingSignin", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage111_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage111_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Investigation");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("After visiting the establishment, the peculiar attitude of the workers and the pristine furnishings further piqued their curiosity. Several days later, they decided to forgo their scientific obligations for one evening and investigate the ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.inv);
	yield return base.text(".");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.devpage = 1;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Please choose which player is making this investigation:");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00045"))
	{
		yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameA, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00045", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage111_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00046"))
	{
		yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameB, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00046", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage111_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players > 2)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00047"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameC, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00047", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage111_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players > 3)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00048"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameD, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00048", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage111_Fragment_3), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players > 4)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00049"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameE, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00049", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage111_Fragment_4), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage112_Init()
{
	base.Passages["BuildplayA"] = new StoryPassage("BuildplayA", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage112_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage112_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Do not allow the other players to see the Storybook while making the decision below.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Continuing Investigation - Compiled Journal Entries of ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.ba)
	{
		yield return base.text("I arrived at the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.ba);
		yield return base.text(" under cover of darkness. I was ill-suited for such stealthy missions, but I kept my cloak and collar about my neck to conceal my identity in case I was discovered.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.bb)
	{
		yield return base.text("A thick fog shrouded my approach on the cool night that I chose to investigate the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.bb);
		yield return base.text(". I asked the carriage driver to await my return on the outskirts of town, while I stole away into the empty streets. Nary a soul was about on this evening, and I was soon inside without arousing suspicion.");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("To my chagrin, a ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"gentleman",
			"gentlewoman"
		}));
		yield return base.text(" stood near the front door of the building. At this late hour, I could only assume that they were standing guard. Not to be thwarted so easily, I tilted my hat to obscure my face and stalked into the alley behind. The lock on the rear door was a trifle for my tools, and I entered without a sound.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I could either provide evidence to help ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("expose");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("the secret inner workings of the building or I could ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("conceal");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("the truth and allow the work to continue. ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The decision was clear to me:");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.playA = int.Parse(this.Vars.playA) + 1;
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00050"))
	{
		yield return base.link("I exposed the truth.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00050", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage112_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00051"))
	{
		yield return base.link("I concealed the true purpose.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00051", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage112_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage112_Fragment_0()
{
	if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.ba)
	{
		this.Vars.pAA = "yes";
		this.Vars.exposeA = int.Parse(this.Vars.exposeA) + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.bb)
	{
		this.Vars.pAB = "yes";
		this.Vars.exposeB = int.Parse(this.Vars.exposeB) + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.bc)
	{
		this.Vars.pAC = "yes";
		this.Vars.exposeC = int.Parse(this.Vars.exposeC) + 1;
	}
	yield return base.abort("ExposeConfirmation");
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage112_Fragment_1()
{
	if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.ba)
	{
		this.Vars.exposeA = int.Parse(this.Vars.exposeA) - 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.bb)
	{
		this.Vars.exposeB = int.Parse(this.Vars.exposeB) - 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.bc)
	{
		this.Vars.exposeC = int.Parse(this.Vars.exposeC) - 1;
	}
	yield return base.abort("ConcealConfirmation");
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage113_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Exposed");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I knew it was the correct decision. To allow this terrible work to continue unabated would not align with my own crucial endeavors. But, would my cousins feel the same way?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.round == 5)
	{
		yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "Devastation2", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "Devastation3", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Do not allow the other players to see the Storybook while making the decision below.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Continuing Investigation - Compiled Journal Entries of ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameE);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.ba)
	{
		yield return base.text("I arrived at the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.ba);
		yield return base.text(" under cover of darkness. I was ill-suited for such stealthy missions, but I kept my cloak and collar about my neck to conceal my identity in case I was discovered.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.bb)
	{
		yield return base.text("A thick fog shrouded my approach on the cool night that I chose to investigate the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.bb);
		yield return base.text(". I asked the carriage driver to await my return on the outskirts of town, while I stole away into the empty streets. Nary a soul was about on this evening, and I was soon inside without arousing suspicion.");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("To my chagrin, a ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"gentleman",
			"gentlewoman"
		}));
		yield return base.text(" stood near the front door of the building. At this late hour, I could only assume that they were standing guard. Not to be thwarted so easily, I tilted my hat to obscure my face and stalked into the alley behind. The lock on the rear door was a trifle for my tools, and I entered without a sound.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I could either provide evidence to help ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("expose");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("the secret inner workings of the building or I could ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("conceal");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("the truth and allow the work to continue. ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The decision was clear to me:");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.playE = int.Parse(this.Vars.playE) + 1;
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00058"))
	{
		yield return base.link("I exposed the truth.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00058", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage118_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00059"))
	{
		yield return base.link("I concealed the true purpose.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00059", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage118_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage118_Fragment_0()
{
	if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.ba)
	{
		this.Vars.pEA = "yes";
		this.Vars.exposeA = int.Parse(this.Vars.exposeA) + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.bb)
	{
		this.Vars.pEB = "yes";
		this.Vars.exposeB = int.Parse(this.Vars.exposeB) + 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.bc)
	{
		this.Vars.pEC = "yes";
		this.Vars.exposeC = int.Parse(this.Vars.exposeC) + 1;
	}
	yield return base.abort("ExposeConfirmation");
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage118_Fragment_1()
{
	if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.ba)
	{
		this.Vars.exposeA = int.Parse(this.Vars.exposeA) - 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.bb)
	{
		this.Vars.exposeB = int.Parse(this.Vars.exposeB) - 1;
	}
	if (this.Vars.inv == this.Vars.bc)
	{
		this.Vars.exposeC = int.Parse(this.Vars.exposeC) - 1;
	}
	yield return base.abort("ConcealConfirmation");
	yield break;
}

private void passage119_Init()
{
	base.Passages["MostInvestigated"] = new StoryPassage("MostInvestigated", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage119_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage119_Main()
{
	List<int> play = new List<int>(new int[]
	{
		this.Vars.playA,
		this.Vars.playB,
		this.Vars.playC,
		this.Vars.playD,
		this.Vars.playE
	});
	int num = (from value in play
	where value == play.Max()
	select value).Count<int>();
	Debug.Log("numberOfMax of max value " + num);
	if (num > 1)
	{
		this.Vars.most = 0;
	}
	else if (this.Vars.playA > Mathf.Max(new int[]
	{
		this.Vars.playB,
		this.Vars.playC,
		this.Vars.playD,
		this.Vars.playE
	}))
	{
		this.Vars.most = this.Vars.nameA;
	}
	else if (this.Vars.playB > Mathf.Max(new int[]
	{
		this.Vars.playC,
		this.Vars.playD,
		this.Vars.playE
	}))
	{
		this.Vars.most = this.Vars.nameB;
	}
	else if (this.Vars.playC > Mathf.Max(this.Vars.playD, this.Vars.playE))
	{
		this.Vars.most = this.Vars.nameC;
	}
	else if (this.Vars.playD > Mathf.Max(new int[]
	{
		this.Vars.playE
	}))
	{
		this.Vars.most = this.Vars.nameD;
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.most = this.Vars.nameE;
	}
	if (this.Vars.hunters == "evil")
	{
		if (this.Vars.goodcount < 2)
		{
			this.Vars.society = "Fraternity of Hunters";
		}
		else
		{
			this.Vars.society = "Order of St. Hubertus";
		}
	}
	if (this.Vars.hunters == "good")
	{
		if (this.Vars.goodcount > 1)
		{
			this.Vars.society = "Fraternity of Hunters";
		}
		else
		{
			this.Vars.society = "Order of St. Hubertus";
		}
	}
	if (this.Vars.most == 0 || this.Vars.most == "" || string.IsNullOrEmpty(this.Vars.most))
	{
		yield return base.abort("DiseaseEnd");
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Most Investigations");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.most);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("performed the most investigative actions. This did not go unnoticed by the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.society);
		yield return base.text(", and despite their allegiances, they felt this exploratory spirit worthy of reward.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.most);
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("immediately gains 4VP.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "DiseaseEnd", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage352_Init()
{
	base.Passages["Prosperity1"] = new StoryPassage("Prosperity1", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage352_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage352_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The Good Fight - Early Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 13;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.society == "Order of St. Hubertus")
	{
		if (this.Vars.gen3pg == 0 || this.Vars.gen3pg == "")
		{
			using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
			{
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("SETUP");
				}
				StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
				this.Vars._SetupImage = "AngryMobSetup1";
				yield return base.text("Turn to page ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("17");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" of the Village Chronicle. Place the Suspicion Marker on space ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					if (this.Vars.Prosperity1 == 0 || this.Vars.Prosperity1 == "")
					{
						this.Vars.Prosperity1 = 1;
						this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) - 2;
						if (this.Vars.players == 4)
						{
							this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) - 1;
						}
						if (this.Vars.players == 5)
						{
							this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) - 1;
						}
					}
					yield return base.text(this.Vars.tracker);
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" and the ");
				yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
				yield return base.text(" token one space to the left. ");
				using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("Pass the Starting Player token as normal.");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" ");
				if (this.Vars.players == 3)

				}

				yield return base.lineBreak();

				yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
				yield return base.text(" token directly on top of the ");
				yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
				yield return base.text(" token.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();

				}

				{
					yield return base.text("Place the ");
					yield return base.text(this.Vars.ba);
					yield return base.text(" tile over spot A on the Village Chronicle. ");
					yield return base.lineBreak();
				}
				if (this.Vars.exposeB > 0)
				{
					yield return base.text("Place the ");
					yield return base.text(this.Vars.bb);
					yield return base.text(" tile over spot B on the Village Chronicle. ");
					yield return base.lineBreak();
				}
				if (this.Vars.exposeC > 0)
				{
					yield return base.text("Place the ");
					yield return base.text(this.Vars.bc);
					yield return base.text(" tile over spot C on the Village Chronicle. ");
					yield return base.lineBreak();
				}
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.text("Return all other Exposed Building tiles to the scenario box.");
			}
			styleScope = null;
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Acceptance");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		{

			using (base.styleScope("italic", true))

			}

		}

			}

			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("pay $1");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" to gain a ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Caretaker");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" piece from Lost. ");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

			}

		}
		styleScope = null;

			yield return base.text(".");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))

			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;

		styleScope = null;

			{

			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else
	{

				}

				{

				}
				yield return base.lineBreak();

				{
					yield return base.text("Place the ");
					yield return base.text(this.Vars.ba);

			}

			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}

		{
