			yield return base.text(" is part of the available pool to build as normal.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Endless Hunt");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("At the end of the round, two of the scientists will be chosen to participate in the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Night of the Hunt.");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" This invitation cannot be refused.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000011901"))
			{
				yield return base.link("Click at the end of the round to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000011901", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage119_Fragment_1), false));
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage120_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Moving Forward - Middle Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 14;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.society == "Order of St. Hubertus")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Acceptance");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Caretaker pieces can now take actions in Town as well as in the Estates. ");
			using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("The same Town placement rules for Servants apply to Caretaker pieces.");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("School for Hybridized Individuals");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;

			yield return base.text("When a player visits the ");

				yield return base.text("School for Hybridized Individuals");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;

			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("pay $1");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" to gain a ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Caretaker");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" piece from Lost. ");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Experiments are Feared");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Anytime a player takes the Perform an Experiment Estate action, they gain 1 ");

			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;

		{
			yield return base.text("Any time the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" token moves, move the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" token along with it. If the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" token overtakes a player, complete the current action and then ");
			yield return base.link("click here for a Storybook message.", "AngryMobStorybook", null);
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00001200"))

				yield return base.link("Click at the end of the round to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00001200", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage120_Fragment_0), false));
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}

			}

			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}

			}

			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Engineering Master's Study");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" is part of the available pool to build as normal.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Endless Hunt");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("At the end of the round, two of the scientists will be chosen to participate in the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Night of the Hunt.");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" This invitation cannot be refused.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00001201"))
			{

			}
			styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage122_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Carefully hand this storybook device to the player that just reached 35VP. This is read within view of all players.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.thirtyFivevp == "creep")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("\"Nasty Rumors\" - Journal Entry, 1878");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("To reach the pinnacle of understanding, only to feel the cruel hand of treachery. The rest of the family was noticeably not distraught when a recent article in the regional newspaper spread an uncomfortable rumor about my personal hygiene.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		this.Vars.twopage = 1;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("I do not have time for this interruption! I do not smell like pickles! It is the formaldehyde solution for my most recent experiment. It is not the smell of pickles; it is the smell of SCIENCE!");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("\"Unfortunate Accident\" - Journal Entry, 1876");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("My work! My property! Sabotaged.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		this.Vars.twopage = 1;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("I awoke this evening to find my home on fire and the culprits nowhere to be found. But, I know who did it. I could still smell the chemical reaction as the fires raged. I would have never expected my cousins to stoop to such a base level. Direct and blatant sabotage? Absolutely unconscionable.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("It will take weeks for my spouse to manage the removal of the damaged piece of our Estate. They are all just jealous of my genius!");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000122"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to return...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000122", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage122_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage122_Fragment_0()
{
	ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = ((this.Vars.round == 7) ? "Hospital1" : ((this.Vars.round == 8) ? "Hospital2" : "Hospital3"));
	this.Vars.trigger35 = 1;
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		if (this.Vars.thirtyFivevp == "creep")
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "Creepy_Icon";
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Immediately ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("gain 2 ");
				yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" and ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("gain 1 ");
				yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Insanity_Icon\" index=0>");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
		}
		else
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "DiscardEstateUpgrade_Icon";
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Immediately ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("lose 4VP");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" and ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("discard an Estate Upgrade of your choice");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
		}
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage123_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Advancements in ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.sci3);
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Please click on the name of the scientist that completed a total of ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("3 B or C ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.sci3);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("Experiments");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(":");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00060"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Dr. " + this.Vars.nameA + " Jr.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00060", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage123_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00061"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Dr. " + this.Vars.nameB + " Jr.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00061", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage123_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players > 2)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00062"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Dr. " + this.Vars.nameC + " Jr.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00062", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage123_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.players > 3)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00063"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Dr. " + this.Vars.nameD + " Jr.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00063", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage123_Fragment_3), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.players > 4)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00064"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Dr. " + this.Vars.nameE + " Jr.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00064", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage123_Fragment_4), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage124_Init()
{
	base.Passages["ChooseScience"] = new StoryPassage("ChooseScience", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage124_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage124_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Carefully hand the Storybook to ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.charity);
		yield return base.text(". This choice is read and made within view of all players.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("\"Universal Interest\" - Journal Entry - November, 1859 - ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.charity);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It has been three days since I received a letter from the Hungarian government and two days since my cousins deigned it necessary to make me the target of their ridicule. My parents cared deeply for this horrid community - a sentiment that those miscreants know nothing about!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I am not some groveler who needs confirmation from the stuffed shirts and upturned noses of European academies. But, getting to choose the ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("subject of the upcoming Symposium");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("that could very well determine if a ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("University");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("is built in ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
	yield return base.text("?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("My parents instilled into me a scientific vigor that far surpasses even the members of my own, somewhat beloved, family. As I returned from studies abroad, it was my own aptitudes that spearheaded my cousins into action. Damn them and their jibes! I will show them. In fact, I have already made my choice and penned my response. It will be I who will be doing the laughing in the end.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{
		yield return base.link("Chemistry", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00065", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage124_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;

	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00066"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Engineering", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00066", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage124_Fragment_1), false));

	yield return base.text("Track.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();

		yield return base.text("gain 5VP");

	this.Vars.twopage = 1;
	yield return base.lineBreak();

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage130_Fragment_0()
{
	this.Vars.hospsign = this.Vars.nameA;
	if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameA && this.Vars.hospA == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitReject");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameB && this.Vars.hospB == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitReject");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameC && this.Vars.hospC == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitReject");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameD && this.Vars.hospD == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitReject");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameE && this.Vars.hospE == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitReject");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitCheck2");
	}
	yield break;
}

	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitReject");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameE && this.Vars.hospE == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitReject");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitCheck2");
	}
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage130_Fragment_4()
{
	this.Vars.hospsign = this.Vars.nameE;
	if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameA && this.Vars.hospA == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitReject");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameB && this.Vars.hospB == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitReject");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameC && this.Vars.hospC == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitReject");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameD && this.Vars.hospD == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitReject");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameE && this.Vars.hospE == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitReject");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("HospitalVisitCheck2");
	}
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage131_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Carefully pick up the Storybook and do not allow any other players to see the screen.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.hospentry = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		1,
		2
	});
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.hospentry == 1)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Visitation Report: Dr. ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.hospsign);
			yield return base.text(" - Notes submitted by Nurse Varga");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Dr. ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.hospsign);
		yield return base.text(" seemed in a hurry. Dismissed each area as sterile and uninspired. Until we arrived at the operating room. Immediately became enraptured, fixated, and I had to thrice repeat myself before they responded.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			1,
			2
		}) == 1)
		{
			yield return base.text("\"This is all wrong. What do they teach in these surgeon schools?\" Dr. ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.hospsign);
			yield return base.text(" asked, clearly not expecting an answer and brazenly entered the operating room to accost the surgeons on duty. They retrieved a scalpel and insisting on completing the operation themselves. I have never seen so much blood.");
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.text("Their response was muffled and I was unable to stop them from entering the theater. Their face was etched in a hideous grin as they stood at the center with their hands raised into the air. At this point, they either refused to listen or entered a catatonic state which left them motionless for nearly an hour.");
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("At this point, ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.hospsign);
		yield return base.text(" had to be escorted by security from the premises. They are barred from any further tours of the facilities.");
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Visitation Report: Dr. ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.hospsign);
			yield return base.text(" - Notes submitted by Nurse Varga");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Relatively uneventful visit, though unsettling. Dr. ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.hospsign);
		yield return base.text(" requested a tour through the wards.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			1,
			2
		}) == 1)
		{
			yield return base.text("Mostly disinterested and silent. However, our visit to the morgue was longer than to my liking. Dr. ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.hospsign);
			yield return base.text(" kept insisting on inspecting the more extreme cases, excitedly asking questions while I unsuccessfully attempted to stop them from physically handling the deceased.");
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.text("At one juncture, Dr. ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.hospsign);
			yield return base.text(" approached a patient in the hallway that had been confined to a bath chair. Unprompted, they began a through examination of the individual, palpating their hairline and skull with their fingers. To my dismay, they were enraptured by a rash along the patients cheek which was covered in small protusions and red boils. They insisted on collecting several samples of the fluid they produced.");
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("After requesting access to more severe emergency cases, we walked the grounds. They kept stating that the facilities were \"unimpressive compared to their own.\" I shudder to think on what that phrase means.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000131"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000131", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage131_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage131_Fragment_0()

	if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameA)

	}
	else if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameB)
	{
		this.Vars.hospB = "yes";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameC)
	{
		this.Vars.hospC = "yes";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameD)
	{
		this.Vars.hospD = "yes";
	}
	else if (this.Vars.hospsign == this.Vars.nameE)
	{
		this.Vars.hospE = "yes";
	}
	yield return base.abort("Gen1Insanity-NoExtraAction");
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage132_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.hospcount == this.Vars.players)
	{
		if (this.Vars.HospitalNegativenextPsg == "" || this.Vars.HospitalNegativenextPsg == 0)
		{
			this.Vars.HospitalNegativenextPsg = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
			{
				"S5HospA1",
				"S5HospA2",
				"S5HospA3"
			});
		}
		yield return base.abort(this.Vars.HospitalNegativenextPsg);
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Lack of Hospitality");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Unfortunately, the lack of participation in the Hospital Board of Trustees needed to be reckoned and any who chose to forgo their obligations felt their business dealings in the local area become even further strained.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if ((this.Vars.players > 4) ? (this.Vars.hospA == "" || this.Vars.hospB == "" || this.Vars.hospC == "" || this.Vars.hospD == "" || this.Vars.hospE == "" || this.Vars.hospA == 0 || this.Vars.hospB == 0 || this.Vars.hospC == 0 || this.Vars.hospD == 0 || this.Vars.hospE == 0) : ((this.Vars.players > 3) ? (this.Vars.hospA == "" || this.Vars.hospB == "" || this.Vars.hospC == "" || this.Vars.hospD == "" || this.Vars.hospA == 0 || this.Vars.hospB == 0 || this.Vars.hospC == 0 || this.Vars.hospD == 0) : ((this.Vars.players > 2) ? (this.Vars.hospA == "" || this.Vars.hospB == "" || this.Vars.hospC == "" || this.Vars.hospA == 0 || this.Vars.hospB == 0 || this.Vars.hospC == 0) : (this.Vars.hospA == "" || this.Vars.hospB == "" || this.Vars.hospA == 0 || this.Vars.hospB == 0))))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000132"))
			{
				yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000132", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage132_Fragment_0), false));
			}
			styleScope = null;
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "NoHospitalCons", null);
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage134_Fragment_0()

	yield return base.abort("NewMaster3A");
	yield break;

private void passage135_Init()
{
	base.Passages["NewMaster3A"] = new StoryPassage("NewMaster3A", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage135_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage135_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.costA == "Biology")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2A = "Animal";
	}
	if (this.Vars.costA == "Engineering")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2A = "Gear";
	}
	if (this.Vars.costA == "Chemistry")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2A = "Bottle";
	}
	if (this.ispopup && this.iscreationA)
	{
		this.iscreationA = false;
		this.ispopup = false;
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.OnGenerationBtn("NewMaster3A", "Give your creation a new, majestic name:", "string", 0.25f);
	}
	if (ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueString() != null)
	{
		this.Vars.creationA = ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueString();
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		this.ispopup = true;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Infamous",
			"Transcendent",
			"Monumental",
			"Nefarious",
			"Unspeakable",
			"Legendary",
			"Noble",
			"Phenomenal",
			"Stunning",
			"Masterful",
			"Insidious"
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationA);
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.passage("MWCreationHubA", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("With my own destiny determined, I resolved to forge a new path into the future and create my Masterwork.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("You may check the cost of completing your new Masterwork at any time by clicking on your name on the main Storybook screen.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "NewMaster1B", null);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage136_Init()
{
	base.Passages["NewMaster"] = new StoryPassage("NewMaster", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage136_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage136_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Masters of Their Own Destiny");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.gen3pg = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It seemed the pervasive gloom of ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("had infected the halls of the great estates. For when the cousins explored the musty recesses of their inherited homes, they discovered great underground laboratories left in startling disarray. Volumetric flasks lay shattered amongst the rusted remains of mechanical devices misshapen and strewn across the floor. And most disconcerting, the tattered remains of a most exceptional experiment. Oh the folly of the depressed and aged mind!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("To those of lesser imagination, this may have been the death knell of their ambitions, but their youthful exuberance could not be shackled by the capricious whims of their progenitors! If their family could not continue the generations of hard work, they would create their own legacy!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to create a new Masterwork!", "NewMaster1A", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage138_Init()
{
	base.Passages["MWCompleteHubA"] = new StoryPassage("MWCompleteHubA", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage138_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage138_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"The Work is Done",
			"I Have Done the Impossible",
			"My Legacy is Ensured",
			"AH HA HA HAAAAA!!!",
			"My Glorious Creation",
			"The Glory is Mine Forever!"
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("- ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("- Journal Entry Excerpt");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.typeA == "creature")
	{
		yield return base.text("Upon the stroke of midnight, lightning struck metal, sending a terrible electrical current through the machinery. My creation awoke, and with wild eyes gazed upon me, its creator. I had done it! I had created life!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeA == "power")
	{
		yield return base.text("To see my work in the flesh, to see ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationA);
		yield return base.text(" finally realized; the passion of the moment overwhelmed my senses. I had done it. I shook my fist at God and all who doubted me! You were wrong! I am invincible!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeA == "robot")
	{
		yield return base.text("A brief, blinding flash and the work was done. I threw my goggles to the floor to gaze upon my creation with my own eyes - ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationA);
		yield return base.text(". The polished metal surface whirred with interior mechanisms churning - then, glorious motion! Oh wondrous automaton, with you by my side the scientific world will be humbled!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeA == "weapon")
	{
		yield return base.text("I seized the firing mechanism and squeezed the polished metal trigger. When the dust settled and my laboratory wall had been made to crumble into dust, I was unable to contain a sinister grin. The world would remember this day and the weapon I had wrought. My fame would be legendary.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeA == "medicine")
	{
		yield return base.text("I tapped the glass bottle, watching the liquid inside swirl and glow with the purity of the mixture. The ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationA);
		yield return base.text(" had been a stunning success and once mass production could be attained, my family's legacy would be secure. I laughed. Then, laughed again. My cacophonous laughter echoed off the stone walls of my estate for years to come.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeA == "drug")
	{
		yield return base.text("I observed the effects as the syringe filled with ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationA);
		yield return base.text(" emptied its contents into the unwilling test subject. Just as I had expected, the reaction was immediate and effusive. For so many years, I had toiled away in the solitude of my estate, and now as I wiped the tears from eyes, my beautiful creation was finally complete.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeA == "demon")
	{
		yield return base.text("The world darkened around me as the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationA);
		yield return base.text(" emerged from a void-like rift in time and space. I could feel the immense power of the insidious being, the air hot with the energy of their presence. They turned to me and with a deep growl, they stated, \"Master.\" I had done it. I was now in control and the world would rue the day they doubted ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
		yield return base.text(" III!");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("The preparations proved tedious, but the resulting wave of spiritual energy as the ritual was completed left me standing in awe of my creation. The ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationA);
		yield return base.text(" was a brilliant success. And the powers I now harnessed were unthinkable!");
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage139_Init()
{
	base.Passages["NewMaster1B"] = new StoryPassage("NewMaster1B", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage139_Main));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage139_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Carefully hand this Storybook device to ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and do not allow any other players to see the screen.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.trig = 2;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000139"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Once you are ready, click here to reveal your secret conversation.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000139", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage139_Fragment_4), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage139_Fragment_4()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Masterwork of My Own - ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
		yield return base.text(" III");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I was no longer constrained by the fickle whims of my ancestors. I could allow my imagination to run wild with possibilities! Within moments, I set to creating something new and magnificent - something that would cause the scientific world to quiver in awestruck wonder.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("My creation is from which scientific discipline?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000091"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Biology.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000091", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage139_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000092"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Engineering.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000092", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage139_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000093"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Chemistry.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000093", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage139_Fragment_2), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000094"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Occult.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000094", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage139_Fragment_3), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage140_Init()
{
	base.Passages["MWComplete"] = new StoryPassage("MWComplete", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage140_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage140_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.tempcomp == this.Vars.nameA)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCompleteHubA", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	if (this.Vars.tempcomp == this.Vars.nameB)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCompleteHubB", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	if (this.Vars.tempcomp == this.Vars.nameC)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCompleteHubC", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	if (this.Vars.tempcomp == this.Vars.nameD)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCompleteHubD", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	if (this.Vars.tempcomp == this.Vars.nameE)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCompleteHubE", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Then, collect your ");
	yield return base.passage("AllMWRewards", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.round == 16)
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to return...", "NoUni1", null);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.round == 17)
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to return...", "NoUni2", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to return...", "NoUni3", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
}

private void passage141_Init()
{
	base.Passages["MWCheck"] = new StoryPassage("MWCheck", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage141_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage141_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.tempcheck == this.Vars.nameA)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCreationHubA", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	else if (this.Vars.tempcheck == this.Vars.nameB)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCreationHubB", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	else if (this.Vars.tempcheck == this.Vars.nameC)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCreationHubC", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	else if (this.Vars.tempcheck == this.Vars.nameD)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCreationHubD", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	else if (this.Vars.tempcheck == this.Vars.nameE)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCreationHubE", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.round == 16)
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to return...", "NoUni1", null);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.round == 17)
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to return...", "NoUni2", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to return...", "NoUni3", null);
	}
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage142_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Click on your name below to view the Masterwork Recipe:");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	this.Vars.gen3pg = 1;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00095"))
	{
		yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameA + " III", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00095", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage142_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00096"))
	{
		yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameB + " III", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00096", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage142_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players > 2)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000097"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameC + " III", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000097", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage142_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.players > 3)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000098"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameD + " III", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000098", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage142_Fragment_3), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.players > 4)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00099"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameE + " III", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00099", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage142_Fragment_4), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage145_Init()
{
	base.Passages["NewMaster2B"] = new StoryPassage("NewMaster2B", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage145_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage145_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("What Type of Glorious Creation");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("With my unique ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.disB);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("skills, this creation was already more focused and impressive than ever before. But, what ingenious type of creation would I explore?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("My creation could be described as what type?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.disB == "biology")
	{
		this.Vars.costB = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Engineering",
			"Chemistry"
		});
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00105"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Creature.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00105", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage145_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00106"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Superpower.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00106", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage145_Fragment_1), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else if (this.Vars.disB == "engineering")
	{
		this.Vars.costB = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Biology",
			"Chemistry"
		});
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00107"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Robot.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00107", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage145_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00108"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Weapon.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00108", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage145_Fragment_3), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else if (this.Vars.disB == "chemistry")
	{
		this.Vars.costB = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Engineering",
			"Biology"
		});
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00109"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Medicine.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00109", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage145_Fragment_4), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00110"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Drug.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00110", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage145_Fragment_5), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.costB = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Engineering",
			"Chemistry",
			"Biology"
		});
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00111"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Demonic Creature.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00111", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage145_Fragment_6), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00112"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Ritual.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00112", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage145_Fragment_7), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage145_Fragment_0()
{
	this.Vars.typeB = "creature";
	yield return base.abort("NewMaster3B");
	yield break;
}

private void passage146_Init()
{
	base.Passages["NewMaster3B"] = new StoryPassage("NewMaster3B", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage146_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage146_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.costB == "Biology")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2B = "Animal";
	}
	if (this.Vars.costB == "Engineering")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2B = "Gear";
	}
	if (this.Vars.costB == "Chemistry")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2B = "Bottle";
	}
	if (this.ispopup)
	{
		this.ispopup = false;
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.OnGenerationBtn("NewMaster3B", "Give your creation a new, majestic name:", "string", 0.5f);
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.creationB = ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueString();
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		this.ispopup = true;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Infamous",
			"Transcendent",
			"Monumental",
			"Nefarious",
			"Unspeakable",
			"Legendary",
			"Noble",
			"Phenomenal",
			"Stunning",
			"Masterful",
			"Insidious"
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationB);
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.passage("MWCreationHubB", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("With my own destiny determined, I resolved to forge a new path into the future and create my Masterwork.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("You may check the cost of completing your new Masterwork at any time by clicking on your name on the main Storybook screen.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "NewMHub", null);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage147_Init()
{
	base.Passages["MWCreationHubB"] = new StoryPassage("MWCreationHubB", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage147_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage147_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.typeB == "creature")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationB);
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Cost:");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("2 Animals, 5 Biology, 1 ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.costB);
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Reward:");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Gain 20VP.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Gain 1 ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Insanity_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(", Gain 2 ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(", Move the ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(".");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeB == "power")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationB);
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Cost:");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("1 Animal, 1 ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.cost2B);
		yield return base.text(", 3 Biology, 3 ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.costB);
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Reward:");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Gain 19VP.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Gain 1 ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Insanity_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(", Gain 2 ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(".");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeB == "robot")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationB);
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Cost:");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("2 Gears, 5 Engineering, 1 ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.costB);
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Reward:");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Gain 20VP.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Gain 1 ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Insanity_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(", Gain 2 ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(".");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeB == "weapon")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationB);
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Cost:");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("1 Gear, 1 ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.cost2B);
		yield return base.text(", 4 Engineering, 2 ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.costB);
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Reward:");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Gain 19VP.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Gain 2 ");

		yield return base.text(", Gain 1 ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(".");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeB == "medicine")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

		}

		yield return base.lineBreak();

			yield return base.text("Reward:");
		}

		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");

			yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationB);
		}

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage148_Init()
{
	base.Passages["MWCompleteHubB"] = new StoryPassage("MWCompleteHubB", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage148_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage148_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"The Work is Done",
			"I Have Done the Impossible",
			"My Legacy is Ensured",
			"AH HA HA HAAAAA!!!",
			"My Glorious Creation",
			"The Glory is Mine Forever!"
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("- ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("- Journal Entry Excerpt");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.typeB == "creature")
	{
		yield return base.text("Upon the stroke of midnight, lightning struck metal, sending a terrible electrical current through the machinery. My creation awoke, and with wild eyes gazed upon me, its creator. I had done it! I had created life!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeB == "power")
	{
		yield return base.text("To see my work in the flesh, to see ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationB);
		yield return base.text(" finally realized; the passion of the moment overwhelmed my senses. I had done it. I shook my fist at God and all who doubted me! You were wrong! I am invincible!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeB == "robot")
	{
		yield return base.text("A brief, blinding flash and the work was done. I threw my goggles to the floor to gaze upon my creation with my own eyes - ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationB);
		yield return base.text(". The polished metal surface whirred with interior mechanisms churning - then, glorious motion! Oh wondrous automaton, with you by my side the scientific world will be humbled!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeB == "weapon")
	{
		yield return base.text("I seized the firing mechanism and squeezed the polished metal trigger. When the dust settled and my laboratory wall had been made to crumble into dust, I was unable to contain a sinister grin. The world would remember this day and the weapon I had wrought. My fame would be legendary.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeB == "medicine")
	{
		yield return base.text("I tapped the glass bottle, watching the liquid inside swirl and glow with the purity of the mixture. The ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationB);
		yield return base.text(" had been a stunning success and once mass production could be attained, my family's legacy would be secure. I laughed. Then, laughed again. My cacophonous laughter echoed off the stone walls of my estate for years to come.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeB == "drug")
	{
		yield return base.text("I observed the effects as the syringe filled with ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationB);
		yield return base.text(" emptied its contents into the unwilling test subject. Just as I had expected, the reaction was immediate and effusive. For so many years, I had toiled away in the solitude of my estate, and now as I wiped the tears from eyes, my beautiful creation was finally complete.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeB == "demon")
	{
		yield return base.text("The world darkened around me as the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationB);
		yield return base.text(" emerged from a void-like rift in time and space. I could feel the immense power of the insidious being, the air hot with the energy of their presence. They turned to me and with a deep growl, they stated, \"Master.\" I had done it. I was now in control and the world would rue the day they doubted ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
		yield return base.text(" III!");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("The preparations proved tedious, but the resulting wave of spiritual energy as the ritual was completed left me standing in awe of my creation. The ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationB);
		yield return base.text(" was a brilliant success. And the powers I now harnessed were unthinkable!");
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage149_Init()
{
	base.Passages["NewMHub"] = new StoryPassage("NewMHub", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage149_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage149_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.trig == this.Vars.players)
	{
		yield return base.abort("NoUni1");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.trig == 1)
	{
		yield return base.abort("NewMaster1B");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.trig == 2)
	{
		yield return base.abort("NewMaster1C");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.trig == 3)
	{
		yield return base.abort("NewMaster1D");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.trig == 4)
	{
		yield return base.abort("NewMaster1E");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("NoUni1");
	}
	yield break;
}

{
	base.Passages["NewMaster1C"] = new StoryPassage("NewMaster1C", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage150_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage150_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Carefully hand this Storybook device to ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameC);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and do not allow any other players to see the screen.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.trig = 3;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000150"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Once you are ready, click here to reveal your secret conversation.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000150", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage150_Fragment_4), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.text("My creation is from which scientific discipline?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage151_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("What Type of Glorious Creation");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("With my unique ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.disC);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("skills, this creation was already more focused and impressive than ever before. But, what ingenious type of creation would I explore?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("My creation could be described as what type?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.disC == "biology")
	{
		this.Vars.costC = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Engineering",
			"Chemistry"
		});
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00117"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Creature.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00117", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage151_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00118"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Superpower.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00118", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage151_Fragment_1), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else if (this.Vars.disC == "engineering")
	{
		this.Vars.costC = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Biology",
			"Chemistry"
		});
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00119"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Robot.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00119", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage151_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00120"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Weapon.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00120", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage151_Fragment_3), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else if (this.Vars.disC == "chemistry")
	{
		this.Vars.costC = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Engineering",
			"Biology"
		});
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00121"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Medicine.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00121", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage151_Fragment_4), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00122"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Drug.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00122", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage151_Fragment_5), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.costC = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Engineering",
			"Chemistry",
			"Biology"
		});
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00123"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Demonic Creature.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00123", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage151_Fragment_6), false));

{

	yield return base.abort("NewMaster3C");

private void passage152_Init()
{
	base.Passages["NewMaster3C"] = new StoryPassage("NewMaster3C", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage152_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage152_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.costC == "Biology")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2C = "Animal";
	}
	if (this.Vars.costC == "Engineering")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2C = "Gear";
	}
	if (this.Vars.costC == "Chemistry")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2C = "Bottle";
	}
	if (this.ispopup)
	{
		this.ispopup = false;
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.OnGenerationBtn("NewMaster3C", "Give your creation a new, majestic name:", "string", 0.5f);
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.creationC = ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueString();
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		this.ispopup = true;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Infamous",
			"Transcendent",
			"Monumental",
			"Nefarious",
			"Unspeakable",
			"Legendary",
			"Noble",
			"Phenomenal",
			"Stunning",
			"Masterful",
			"Insidious"
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationC);
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.passage("MWCreationHubC", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("With my own destiny determined, I resolved to forge a new path into the future and create my Masterwork.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("You may check the cost of completing your new Masterwork at any time by clicking on your name on the main Storybook screen.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "NewMHub", null);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage153_Init()
{
	base.Passages["NewMaster1D"] = new StoryPassage("NewMaster1D", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage153_Main));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage153_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Carefully hand this Storybook device to ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameD);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and do not allow any other players to see the screen.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.trig = 4;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000153"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Once you are ready, click here to reveal your secret conversation.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000153", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage153_Fragment_4), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("My creation is from which scientific discipline?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00125"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Biology.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00125", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage153_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00126"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Engineering.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00126", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage153_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00127"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Chemistry.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00127", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage153_Fragment_2), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{
		yield return base.link("Occult.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00128", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage153_Fragment_3), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage155_Init()
{
	base.Passages["MWCompleteHubC"] = new StoryPassage("MWCompleteHubC", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage155_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage155_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"The Work is Done",
			"I Have Done the Impossible",
			"My Legacy is Ensured",
			"AH HA HA HAAAAA!!!",
			"My Glorious Creation",
			"The Glory is Mine Forever!"
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("- ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameC);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("- Journal Entry Excerpt");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.typeC == "creature")
	{
		yield return base.text("Upon the stroke of midnight, lightning struck metal, sending a terrible electrical current through the machinery. My creation awoke, and with wild eyes gazed upon me, its creator. I had done it! I had created life!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeC == "power")
	{
		yield return base.text("To see my work in the flesh, to see ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationC);
		yield return base.text(" finally realized; the passion of the moment overwhelmed my senses. I had done it. I shook my fist at God and all who doubted me! You were wrong! I am invincible!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeC == "robot")
	{
		yield return base.text("A brief, blinding flash and the work was done. I threw my goggles to the floor to gaze upon my creation with my own eyes  - ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationC);
		yield return base.text(". The polished metal surface whirred with interior mechanisms churning - then, glorious motion! Oh wondrous automaton, with you by my side the scientific world will be humbled!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeC == "weapon")
	{
		yield return base.text("I seized the firing mechanism and squeezed the polished metal trigger. When the dust settled and my laboratory wall had been made to crumble into dust, I was unable to contain a sinister grin. The world would remember this day and the weapon I had wrought. My fame would be legendary.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeC == "medicine")
	{
		yield return base.text("I tapped the glass bottle, watching the liquid inside swirl and glow with the purity of the mixture. The ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationC);
		yield return base.text(" had been a stunning success and once mass production could be attained, my family's legacy would be secure. I laughed. Then, laughed again. My cacophonous laughter echoed off the stone walls of my estate for years to come.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeC == "drug")
	{
		yield return base.text("I observed the effects as the syringe filled with ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationC);
		yield return base.text(" emptied its contents into the unwilling test subject. Just as I had expected, the reaction was immediate and effusive. For so many years, I had toiled away in the solitude of my estate, and now as I wiped the tears from eyes, my beautiful creation was finally complete.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeC == "demon")
	{
		yield return base.text("The world darkened around me as the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationC);
		yield return base.text(" emerged from a void-like rift in time and space. I could feel the immense power of the insidious being, the air hot with the energy of their presence. They turned to me and with a deep growl, they stated, \"Master.\" I had done it. I was now in control and the world would rue the day they doubted ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameC);
		yield return base.text(" III!");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("The preparations proved tedious, but the resulting wave of spiritual energy as the ritual was completed left me standing in awe of my creation. The ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationC);
		yield return base.text(" was a brilliant success. And the powers I now harnessed were unthinkable!");
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage156_Init()
{
	base.Passages["NewMaster2D"] = new StoryPassage("NewMaster2D", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage156_Main));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage156_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("What Type of Glorious Creation");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("With my unique ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.disD);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("skills, this creation was already more focused and impressive than ever before. But, what ingenious type of creation would I explore?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("My creation could be described as what type?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.disD == "biology")
	{
		this.Vars.costD = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Engineering",
			"Chemistry"
		});
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00129"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Creature.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00129", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage156_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00130"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Superpower.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00130", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage156_Fragment_1), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else if (this.Vars.disD == "engineering")
	{
		this.Vars.costD = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Biology",
			"Chemistry"
		});
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00131"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Robot.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00131", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage156_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00132"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Weapon.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00132", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage156_Fragment_3), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else if (this.Vars.disD == "chemistry")
	{
		this.Vars.costD = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Engineering",
			"Biology"
		});
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00133"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Medicine.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00133", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage156_Fragment_4), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00134"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Drug.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00134", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage156_Fragment_5), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.costD = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Engineering",
			"Chemistry",
			"Biology"
		});
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00135"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Demonic Creature.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00135", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage156_Fragment_6), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00136"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Ritual.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00136", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage156_Fragment_7), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage157_Init()
{
	base.Passages["NewMaster3D"] = new StoryPassage("NewMaster3D", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage157_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage157_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.costD == "Biology")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2D = "Animal";
	}
	if (this.Vars.costD == "Engineering")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2D = "Gear";
	}
	if (this.Vars.costD == "Chemistry")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2D = "Bottle";
	}
	if (this.ispopup)
	{
		this.ispopup = false;
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.OnGenerationBtn("NewMaster3D", "Give your creation a new, majestic name:", "string", 0.5f);
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.creationD = ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueString();
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		this.ispopup = true;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The ");

		}));

	}

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	}

	yield break;
	yield break;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage160_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The Cure");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("They dined together on weekends, accepting hosting duties with a benign reciprocity. As such, many an evening's conversation descended into more hotly contested subjects of the time. No topic was more pervasive than disease. And most specifically, Yellow Fever; with the incessant sound of coughing and chiming of bells with every breeze.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("While they agreed that for a ");
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		yield return base.text("duo");
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		yield return base.text("trio");
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 4)
	{
		yield return base.text("quartet");
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 5)
	{
		yield return base.text("quintet");
	}
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("of respectable, infamous scholars, this problem should prove trivial, it was the actual curing effect that was hotly contested. The disease provided them a decent concealment for their surreptitious enterprise. Were they to become philanthropists, it may prove detrimental to secrecy.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("They decided to leave the matter up to personal pursuits. If someone felt industrious enough to complete it, then so be it.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000160"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000160", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage160_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Gain 20VP.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Gain 1 ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Insanity_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(", Gain 2 ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(", Move the ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(".");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("<i>Note: This Masterwork still requires 1 A Experiment, 2 B Experiments, and 3 C Experiments to be completed.</i>");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage162_Init()
