private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage162_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"The Work is Done",
			"I Have Done the Impossible",
			"My Legacy is Ensured",
			"AH HA HA HAAAAA!!!",
			"My Glorious Creation",
			"The Glory is Mine Forever!"
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("- ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameD);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("- Journal Entry Excerpt");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.typeD == "creature")
	{
		yield return base.text("Upon the stroke of midnight, lightning struck metal, sending a terrible electrical current through the machinery. My creation awoke, and with wild eyes gazed upon me, its creator. I had done it! I had created life!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeD == "power")
	{
		yield return base.text("To see my work in the flesh, to see ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationD);
		yield return base.text(" finally realized; the passion of the moment overwhelmed my senses. I had done it. I shook my fist at God and all who doubted me! You were wrong! I am invincible!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeD == "robot")
	{
		yield return base.text("A brief, blinding flash and the work was done. I threw my goggles to the floor to gaze upon my creation with my own eyes - ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationD);
		yield return base.text(". The polished metal surface whirred with interior mechanisms churning - then, glorious motion! Oh wondrous automaton, with you by my side the scientific world will be humbled!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeD == "weapon")
	{
		yield return base.text("I seized the firing mechanism and squeezed the polished metal trigger. When the dust settled and my laboratory wall had been made to crumble into dust, I was unable to contain a sinister grin. The world would remember this day and the weapon I had wrought. My fame would be legendary.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeD == "medicine")
	{
		yield return base.text("I tapped the glass bottle, watching the liquid inside swirl and glow with the purity of the mixture. The ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationD);
		yield return base.text(" had been a stunning success and once mass production could be attained, my family's legacy would be secure. I laughed. Then, laughed again. My cacophonous laughter echoed off the stone walls of my estate for years to come.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeD == "drug")
	{
		yield return base.text("I observed the effects as the syringe filled with ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationD);
		yield return base.text(" emptied its contents into the unwilling test subject. Just as I had expected, the reaction was immediate and effusive. For so many years, I had toiled away in the solitude of my estate, and now as I wiped the tears from eyes, my beautiful creation was finally complete.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeD == "demon")
	{
		yield return base.text("The world darkened around me as the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationD);
		yield return base.text(" emerged from a void-like rift in time and space. I could feel the immense power of the insidious being, the air hot with the energy of their presence. They turned to me and with a deep growl, they stated, \"Master.\" I had done it. I was now in control and the world would rue the day they doubted ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameD);
		yield return base.text(" III!");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("The preparations proved tedious, but the resulting wave of spiritual energy as the ritual was completed left me standing in awe of my creation. The ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationD);
		yield return base.text(" was a brilliant success. And the powers I now harnessed were unthinkable!");
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage169_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GENERATION III:");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The Fraternity of Hunters");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The disease had revealed a much deeper evil than the family could have ever expected: An evil ignorance that dwells within the minds of the people. It had not only left the previous generation in shambles, but imbued the townsfolk with a profound, insatiable fear, even as the town returned to relative stability. During the day, the people watched the forests, glimpsing dark shadows flitting between the trees. At night, they steeled themselves against the wailing howls of unseen terrors, dreading that their children would be stolen away from their beds.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("That was until the Fraternity of Hunters, emboldened by the success of their clandestine operations, emerged from the shadows on the night of a blood red moon. They wore long-tail coats of black, burgundy, and dark leather, a wooden cross hanging either from their necks or dangling from their sides. They clutched crossbows, whips, and daggers freshly glimmering with crimson fluid. Their blood-stained attire and steel-eyed gaze evoked the undaunted presence of ones who had peered into the void and returned forever changed.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Their stated goal: to slay every last beast in the land and return those who had unleashed this foul plague back to the depths of hell from whence they came. The Fraternity turned the fear of the populace to their advantage. They fed the superstitions of the people, blaming the sickness and disease on fiendish creatures from the dark.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("As expected, the family quickly grew to find their presence exhausting, both ideologically and financially. Clearly, the cousins opined, these Hunters' fear-mongering stemmed from a lack of true, scientific knowledge. As defenders against an unknown terror, they stood in direct competition to continued experimentation unfettered by ethical considerations. Yet, the Fraternity's need for additional capital to fuel their frequent \"hunts\" prevented the family from taking more direct action.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Perhaps driven by a sense of limited time or jealousy over the Hunter's ability to frighten the townsfolk even moreso than their own actions, the cousins continued their meticulous labors in earnest. However, they were deeply unaware of just how intertwined their fates would be to the Fraternity.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "EvilConsequences", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.huntvp = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		4,
		5
	});
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage170_Init()
{
	base.Passages["EvilConsequences"] = new StoryPassage("EvilConsequences", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage170_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage170_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The Consequences of Disobedience");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.society == "Fraternity of Hunters")
	{
		yield return base.text("In the evenings, the Fraternity gathered in the former Town Hall and celebrated their political takeover of the small town. Observers could hear their loud revelry echo through the streets late into the night. The townsfolk had no reason to doubt their loyalty as it appeared that their activities kept both sickness and superstitions at bay.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("For the family members that had aided them in their efforts, they wore wide false-smiles and offered toasts to their continued partnership. But, for those that had plotted against them, they remained wary.");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("In the center of town, in the full light of day and without fear of reprisal, a silver-haired beast rose to its hindlegs, almost human in stature. On the steps of the former Town Hall, she held the still-beating heart of a man who had refused to join their numbers. ");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The Order had revealed its true self with an unsettling ease, swiftly taking over the town and demanding alliance in the most vicious of terms. Streaks of dried blood and viscera adorned the windows of local businesses and homes. The family was only spared their wrath through allegiance or a cursed acknowledgement of their continued exploitation.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.society == "Fraternity of Hunters")
	{
		if ((this.Vars.players > 4) ? (this.Vars.allyA == "hunters" && this.Vars.allyB == "hunters" && this.Vars.allyC == "hunters" && this.Vars.allyD == "hunters" && this.Vars.allyE == "hunters") : ((this.Vars.players > 3) ? (this.Vars.allyA == "hunters" && this.Vars.allyB == "hunters" && this.Vars.allyC == "hunters" && this.Vars.allyD == "hunters") : ((this.Vars.players > 2) ? (this.Vars.allyA == "hunters" && this.Vars.allyB == "hunters" && this.Vars.allyC == "hunters") : (this.Vars.allyA == "hunters" && this.Vars.allyB == "hunters"))))
		{
			yield return base.link("click here to continue...", "EvilMayor", null);
		}
		else
		{
			using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00017001"))
			{
				yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00017001", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage170_Fragment_0), false));
			}
			styleScope = null;
		}
	}
	else if ((this.Vars.players > 4) ? (this.Vars.allyA == "wolves" && this.Vars.allyB == "wolves" && this.Vars.allyC == "wolves" && this.Vars.allyD == "wolves" && this.Vars.allyE == "wolves") : ((this.Vars.players > 3) ? (this.Vars.allyA == "wolves" && this.Vars.allyB == "wolves" && this.Vars.allyC == "wolves" && this.Vars.allyD == "wolves") : ((this.Vars.players > 2) ? (this.Vars.allyA == "wolves" && this.Vars.allyB == "wolves" && this.Vars.allyC == "wolves") : (this.Vars.allyA == "wolves" && this.Vars.allyB == "wolves"))))
	{
		yield return base.link("click here to continue...", "EvilMayor", null);
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00017003"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00017003", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage170_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage170_Fragment_0()

			yield return base.text("SETUP");
		}

		}

		{

			{

				yield return base.text(" III gains 1 ");
				yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
				yield return base.text(".");
			}

				yield return base.text(" III gains 1 ");

			}
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.players >= 5)
		{
			if (this.Vars.allyE != "hunters")

				yield return base.text(" III gains 1 ");

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage171_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Taste of Evil - Early Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 10;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.gen3pg == 0 || this.Vars.gen3pg == "")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "StartPlayerToken";
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			if (this.Vars.society == "Fraternity of Hunters")
			{
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("Turn to Page 16 of the Village Chronicle. ");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text("Return the Angry Mob token to 1 space to the left of the Suspicion Marker. ");
				using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("Pass the Starting Player token as normal. ");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				if (this.Vars.players == 3)
				{
					yield return base.text("Then, since this is a 3 player game, pass the starting player marker clockwise 1 additional time.");
				}
			}
			else
			{
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("Turn to Page 18 of the Village Chronicle. ");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text("Retrieve the ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("Spawning Pods");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" Vanity Estate Upgrade and place it near the game board. Return the Angry Mob token to 1 space to the left of the Suspicion Marker. ");
				using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("Pass the Starting Player token as normal. ");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				if (this.Vars.players == 3)
				{
					yield return base.text("Then, since this is a 3 player game, pass the starting player marker clockwise 1 additional time.");
				}
			}
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			if (this.Vars.exposeA <= 1)
			{
				yield return base.text("Place the ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.ba);
				yield return base.text(" tile over spot A on the Village Chronicle. ");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.exposeB <= 1)
			{
				yield return base.text("Place the ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.bb);
				yield return base.text(" tile over spot B on the Village Chronicle. ");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.exposeC <= 1)
			{
				yield return base.text("Place the ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.bc);
				yield return base.text(" tile over spot C on the Village Chronicle.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Return all other Building tiles to the scenario box.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.society == "Fraternity of Hunters")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("The Hunter's Rest");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("You may only place a Servant/Spouse piece on this building. This action causes you to pay $1 to the supply. Then, ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("at the end of the round");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(", any piece on this building will become Lost.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Taxation");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("At the end of each round, the Fraternity will check to make sure each player has placed a piece on ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("The Hunter's Rest");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(". If a player has not done so, they will be forced to pay a penalty.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00001710"))
			{
				yield return base.link("Click at the end of the round to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00001710", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage171_Fragment_0), false));
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" Masterwork Completion");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("When a player completes their Masterwork, ");
			yield return base.link("click here for a special message from the Order.", "MWTokenResolve", null);
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("MONSTER SPAWN");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("The Town Hall of the village has been transformed into the unofficial headquarters of the Order. When a player visits the Monster Spawn, they may ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Perform an Experiment");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("A Gift of Spawning");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("At the end of the Generation, the player with the most completed ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Occult");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" Experiments will receive the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Spawning Pods");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" Vanity Estate Upgrade.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00001711"))
			{
				yield return base.link("Click at the end of the round to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00001711", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage171_Fragment_1), false));
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage172_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Taste of Evil - Middle Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 11;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.society == "Fraternity of Hunters")
	{
		if (this.Vars.confront == "yes")
		{
			using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
			{
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("The Hunt is On");
				}
				StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			}
			styleScope = null;
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("At the end of this round, players will have the option to donate (discard) a completed Experiment card ");
				using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("(not a Masterwork)");
				}
				StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" to The Grand Contest event. If the combined VP total of these Experiments can vanquish the hunters, they will submit to public humiliation. Players cannot pay taxes by visiting The Hunter's Rest.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.text("Also, the player who contributes the Experiment with the highest VP total will gain ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text(this.Vars.huntvp);
					yield return base.text("VP. ");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("If players are tied, all tied players receive this bonus.");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000017202"))
				{
					yield return base.link("Click at the end of the round to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000017202", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage172_Fragment_2), false));
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
			}
			styleScope = null;
		}
		else
		{
			using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
			{
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("Safe and Protected");
				}
				StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			}
			styleScope = null;
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("We have decided to believe the Fraternity of Hunters and allow them to continue their important work, though it may place significant financial constraints upon us.");
			}
			styleScope = null;
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
			{
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("The Hunter's Rest");
				}
				StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			}
			styleScope = null;
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("You may only place a Servant/Spouse piece on this building. This action causes you to pay $1 to the supply. Then, at the end of the round, any piece on this building will become Lost.");
			}
			styleScope = null;
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
			{
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("Taxation");
				}
				StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			}
			styleScope = null;
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("At the end of each round, the Fraternity will check to make sure each player has placed a piece on ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("The Hunter's Rest");
				}
				StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(". If a player has not done so, they will be forced to pay a penalty.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000017200"))
				{
					yield return base.link("Click at the end of the round to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000017200", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage172_Fragment_0), false));
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
			}
			styleScope = null;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Storybook\" index=0>");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text(" Masterwork Completion");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("When a player completes their Masterwork, ");
			yield return base.link("click here for a special message from the Order.", "MWTokenResolve", null);
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage174_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.building == "bank")
	{
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		{
			yield return base.text("Carefully hand the Storybook to ");

			yield return base.text("III.");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;

		{
			yield return base.text("Avarice Aplently");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		yield return base.text(this.Vars.mayor);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("name, the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.society);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("could not help but offer thanks. As a token of their appreciation, they felt it best to help construct an expansion to their Estate.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000174"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000174", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage174_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("MayorLibraryEvil");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage175_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Condescending Patronage");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.gen3pg = 0;
	this.Vars.conpat = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
	{
		1,
		2
	});
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It should be expected that the townsfolk who had placed their trust in a group of hunters protecting them from real supernatural threats would joke about generations past and the absurd push to build a hospital. It was clear to them that disease was caused by the presence of demons.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.charity);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("III's family legacy of ");

	{
		yield return base.text("charity");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000175", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage175_Fragment_0), false));

		{

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage176_Main()
{
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
	yield return base.text("/B/C/D/E = chosen name of player");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.players);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("= number of players");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.playtxt);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("= text version of number of players");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.randomplayer);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("= array of current player names");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.randomname);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("= used with above for random name.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("= name of the village in the game");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("II (remember to make it the second for Gen 2)");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("III (remember to make it the third for Gen 3)");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GEN I");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{
		yield return base.text("space 4");
	}
	styleScope = null;

	{

	}
	styleScope = null;

	{

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage179_Fragment_0()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.hunters == "evil")
	{
		yield return base.text("It was unorthodox for ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.gen1creep);
		yield return base.text(", or anyone of that reclusive lineage, to entertain unknown visitors, but something must have piqued their curiosity. A conversation from an evening dinner is noted in a journal entry:");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("\"Your estate is simply exquisite,\" the representative was noted as saying with an unsettling grin. \"I am impressed to find a rarefied jewel nestled in such a remote place. But, as you will no doubt agree, it can always use improvement and I would like to offer you support in this.\" In fact, it was noted that the individual's mannerisms were especially secretive and plotting.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The representative from the Fraternity of Hunters offered their support with substantial funds. With the \"hope\" that this kindness would be repaid in the future.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("CHOOSE:");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.link("Accept the offer.", "Gen1CreepyYes", null);
		yield return base.text("(To gain $2.)");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("OR");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.link("Refuse the offer.", "Gen1CreepyNo", null);
		yield return base.text("(To avoid a debt in the future.)");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("It was unorthodox for ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.gen1creep);
		yield return base.text(", or anyone of that reclusive lineage, to entertain unknown visitors, but something must have piqued their curiosity. A conversation from an evening dinner is noted in a journal entry:");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("\"Your reputation is known across the region for vehemently challenging the established norms,\" the representative from the Order of St. Hubertus was noted as saying with a wide grin. They leaned in conspiratorially, an expensive perfume loud enough in fragrance to draw water from the eyes. \"From what I hear, you are unwilling to allow the rules of academia to hold your work back from its true excellence. Please, let me admire your experimentation.\"");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("This was highly controversial! And to be so brazen about it! It was left to the scientist to decide if being granted the opportunity to ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("perform an extra experiment");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" was worth the possible consequences of revealing one's work.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("CHOOSE:");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.link("Accept.", "Gen1CreepyYes", null);
		yield return base.text("(To take a Perform Experiment Action.)");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("OR");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.link("Refuse.", "Gen1CreepyNo", null);
		yield return base.text("(If you cannot or choose not to take the action.)");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	}

	yield return base.text(". Fraternity of Hunters is ");

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage187_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Call for Assistance");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Each cousin's recollection of events seems to corroborate the same story during the Summer of 1892. A messenger, obviously meant to intimidate, arrived by carriage unannounced precisely at noon, dressed in a dapper gray suit stained in thick streaks by rivulets of blood that cascaded from his shoulders. He wore a mask of gore, his animalistic features stained a sanguine red that still dripped from the tips of his teeth, his belly distending the buttons as if he had recently enjoyed a horrifying meal.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("\"I come to collect,\" he entreated with a bow and disgusting lick of his lips. \"It is by our pleasure that you and your family remain alive. And we have need of the knowledge of experimentation that you most assuredly can provide. If this cannot be arranged,\" he paused, pointing in the direction of a servant, \"I have slaked my thirst on the blood of lesser individuals than these today, that I guarantee.\"");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Making a deal with demons? It was impossible for the young scientists to expect an entirely trustworthy offer as presented, yet to allow a human to be knowingly sacrificed to the jaws of these grotesque animals would also be unconscionable.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("CHOOSE:");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("In turn order, each player decides whether to contribute an Experiment. Donated Experiments are turned face-down and placed under your Masterwork card.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If a player donates, they will receive an immediate bonus based on the level of the Experiment they donate (");
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("higher levels granting higher rewards");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(").");
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	}

	styleScope = null;

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;

	ViewSpecialEvent.instance.ShowEventPopup();
	yield return base.text("All remaining eligible players take all the Experiments they have completed ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("this Generation");
	}
	styleScope = null;

	yield return base.text("into their hands ");
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("(excluding any Masterwork)");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(". Then, they secretly choose an Experiment card (or no card at all) and keep it hidden under their palm.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Once all players have chosen, all players reveal the card (or no card) they have chosen simultaneously. This card will be discarded after the event is resolved.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Then, players will ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("count up the total value of the VP on all donated Experiment cards.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If the value is equal to ");
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.huntnum = this.macros1.random(3.0, 7.0);
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.huntnum = this.macros1.random(8.0, 12.0);
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 4)
	{
		this.Vars.huntnum = this.macros1.random(11.0, 15.0);
	}
	if (this.Vars.players == 5)
	{
		this.Vars.huntnum = this.macros1.random(13.0, 19.0);
	}
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.huntnum);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("or higher, the unleashed experiments will succeed.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If the value is less, the hunters will prevail.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h0000195"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to start the bid.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h0000195", HarloweEnchantCommand.None, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage195_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage203_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Ignored Amongst the Scientific Elite");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.playtxt);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("cousins watched with dour hearts as the once morose streets were festooned with bright spring colors. Educated middle-class families strolled along the sidewalks in modest clothing. Children laughed and rode bicycles in the park. They shuddered at the sight. It was all ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("too good");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(".");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("With the initial festivities over, their estimation had soured in the eyes of the academics. Though they had not been spurned or mistreated, the once generous enthusiasm had waned from repeated ethical infractions, misuse of the medical operating theater, and radical outbursts during local symposiums. And to complicate matters further, it became increasingly obvious that due to the peaceful and progressive values of ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
	yield return base.text(", the educated were less troubled with matters of any immediate, existential, or diabolical concern.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The solution to this lack of a problem was obvious. If the world refused to create a new, horrific problem to solve, then they would defy nature and create it themselves. Surely, if they combined their efforts, they could create the ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("ultimate disease");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text("! A disease so infectious that they would forever undo this plague of positivity.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("This would certainly ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("rid them of this unfair and blatant balancing");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("of fortunes.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "UniCharity", null);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage204_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The Ultimate Disease");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	ViewSpecialEvent.instance.ShowEventPopup();
	yield return base.text("As the oppressive sunshine illuminated the study of ");
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			this.Vars.nameA,
			this.Vars.nameB
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			this.Vars.nameA,
			this.Vars.nameB,
			this.Vars.nameC
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.players == 4)
	{
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			this.Vars.nameA,
			this.Vars.nameB,
			this.Vars.nameC,
			this.Vars.nameD
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.players == 5)
	{
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			this.Vars.nameA,
			this.Vars.nameB,
			this.Vars.nameC,
			this.Vars.nameD,
			this.Vars.nameE
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			this.Vars.nameA,
			this.Vars.nameB
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
	}
	yield return base.text("III, the cousins assembled to finalize their creation. With a large piece of parchment sprawled across the desk and delightful bean strudels with heavy cream for refreshment, the scientists began to formulate a blueprint using the knowledge they had gained from recent experimentations.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Some, however, were more forthcoming with information than others.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("VOTE");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Players will now vote to collaborate with their knowledge to create a new disease. All players take their Voting token into their hand. Players will secretly choose a side to place face up in their palm. Then, they will close their fist and extend it to the center of the table.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("A ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Yay");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("vote is a vote to discard ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("1 completed Chemistry or Occult Experiment");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(".");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("A ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Nay");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("vote is a vote to NOT contribute an experiment.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("When all players have chosen, all players reveal their vote. Tally all votes and the side with the most votes wins. ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Ties are considered a win for the \"yay\" vote.");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage209_Fragment_0()
{
	this.Vars.hcount = int.Parse(this.Vars.hcount) + 1;
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameA)
	{
		this.Vars.allyA = "hunters";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameB)
	{
		this.Vars.allyB = "hunters";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameC)
	{
		this.Vars.allyC = "hunters";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameD)
	{
		this.Vars.allyD = "hunters";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameE)
	{
		this.Vars.allyE = "hunters";
	}
	if (this.Vars.round == 5)
	{
		yield return base.abort("Devastation2");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("Devastation3");
	}
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage210_Fragment_0()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.allyA == 0 || this.Vars.allyA == "" || string.IsNullOrEmpty(this.Vars.allyA))
	{
		this.Vars.meet = this.Vars.nameA;
		yield return base.abort("RefusalReveal");
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.meet = this.Vars.nameA;
		yield return base.abort("JoinedAlready");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
}

	{

	});

	{

		yield return base.text("As such, it was a calm Sunday afternoon when a local werewolf doffed his cap and interrupted tea time by holding up a blood-stained and torn piece of fabric.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("He placed the scrap onto the table. \"We would return the body to you for proper burial if it were still possible,\" he shrugged, his ears flattening. \"But, you know how it goes when bones are involved. Sorry.\"");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Another good servant gone. It was somewhat inevitable, yet still an unfortunate loss of life, time and money.");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("To be awakened early morning after a late night's work was agitating, but to awake to a shrill, blood-curdling scream was something else entirely.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("A woman in a modest blue dress crouched near the entrance to the estate, her blood-covered maw held within two clawed hands as she wailed in distress. A few feet away, two wolves clad in sharp business suits huddled over the dead body of a servant, tearing into the flesh with their teeth and claws as fresh blood flowed down the gravel drive.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("A monster stood nearby, clearly resisting the urge to join into the fray. He fixed his tie and wiped away saliva from his chin before speaking in a solemn voice. \"Poor thing couldn't control herself. Took the first bite. Terrible tragedy. Awfully sorry.\"");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Perhaps it was unavoidable that the close proximity of humanity to the beasts would incite such an event.");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage221_Main()
{
	this.Vars.townname = GLOBALS.townName;
	using (base.styleScope("heading", 1))
	{
		yield return base.text("ERROR!");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text("Thank you and please do excuse our forgetfulness.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Of course, ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("is an appropriate and fitting moniker for a place to conduct important scientific research. In fact, history will remember this name, mark my words.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to Continue...", "Start2", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage222_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Preparations");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.players = GLOBALS.playerCount;
	this.Vars.nameA = GLOBALS.nameA;
	this.Vars.nameB = GLOBALS.nameB;
	if (this.Vars.players > 2)
	{
		this.Vars.nameC = GLOBALS.nameC;
	}
	if (this.Vars.players > 3)
	{
		this.Vars.nameD = GLOBALS.nameD;
	}
	if (this.Vars.players > 4)
	{
		this.Vars.nameE = GLOBALS.nameE;
	}
	this.Vars.townname = GLOBALS.townName;
	this.Vars.playtxt = ((this.Vars.players == 2) ? "two" : ((this.Vars.players == 3) ? "three" : ((this.Vars.players == 4) ? "four" : ((this.Vars.players == 5) ? "five" : "two"))));
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Complete the standard setup for ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.playtxt);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("players as shown in the rulebook. ");
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Note that the ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("track and starting player will be set by the Storybook in the coming pages.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("<align=\"center\">");
	yield return base.text("<line-height=400%>");
	yield return base.text("<size=200>");
	yield return base.text("<sprite=\"ScenarioBox3D_Disease\" index=0>");
	yield return base.text("</size>");
	yield return base.text("</align>");
	yield return base.text("</line-height>");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Then, retrieve ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The Cost of Disease");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("Scenario box, which will contain all components needed for this story. As the Storybook progresses, it will ask you to put items into play from this box. Be sure to keep it nearby.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "Preface-TCOD", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage223_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Foreword");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Herein contains a historical account of a peculiar lineage. One that spans multiple generations and by all accounts will continue to fascinate historians for many years to come.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I have endeavored to provide as complete a scholarly history as one could provide given the conflicting accounts and whims of hearsay. While many of the details, haunting to the imagination as they may be, stretch the very limits of our human understanding, it is my hope that this text and the accompanying research materials procured will provide evidence as to their truth. The harrowing and potentially supernatural series of events has the capacity to shake the very foundations of the scientific world as we perceive it.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("With deference to the fellowship that commissioned this explicit work, though I have never met with these generous benefactors, I humbly submit this biographical account in its entirety and swear by the veracity of the contents within.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("In good health,");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Dr. Ensign Benwallis");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "Scenario5Start", null);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage225_Main()
{

	{
		this.Vars.Diseases2nextPsg = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			1,
			2
		});
	}
	this.Vars.disease2 = this.Vars.Diseases2nextPsg;
	this.Vars.devpage = 0;
	if (this.Vars.disease2 == 1)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("A Cleansing");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("When the symptoms grew too fierce, they locked themselves away inside one of the myriad rooms of their estate. 		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00022501"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00022501", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage225_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Wasted Potential");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("While the disease that plagued the scientists was manageable, the effects were still tiresome. Time spent advancing what they considered \"true science\" was instead squandered upon practical medical applications to assuage their own afflictions.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage227_Fragment_0()
{
	this.Vars.wcount = int.Parse(this.Vars.wcount) + 1;
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameA)
	{
		this.Vars.allyA = "wolves";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameB)
	{
		this.Vars.allyB = "wolves";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameC)
	{
		this.Vars.allyC = "wolves";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameD)
	{
		this.Vars.allyD = "wolves";
	}
	if (this.Vars.meet == this.Vars.nameE)
	{
		this.Vars.allyE = "wolves";
	}
	if (this.Vars.round == 5)
	{
		yield return base.abort("Devastation2");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("Devastation3");
	}
	yield break;
}

{
	if (this.Vars.round == 5)
	{
		yield return base.abort("Devastation2");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("Devastation3");
	}
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage228_Fragment_0()
{
	ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = "HelpingEvil2";
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = ((this.Vars.society == "Fraternity of Hunters") ? "S1_HunterToken" : "S1_WolfToken");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Retrieve the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.society);
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("tokens. Retrieve the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Master's Study");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("Vanity Estate Upgrades.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.Vars.society == "Fraternity of Hunters")
		{
			if (this.Vars.allyA == "hunters")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
				yield return base.text(" III gains ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("4VP");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" and gains a ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.society);
				yield return base.text(" token.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.allyB == "hunters")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
				yield return base.text(" III gains ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("4VP");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" and gains a ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.society);
				yield return base.text(" token.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.players > 2 && this.Vars.allyC == "hunters")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameC);
				yield return base.text(" III gains ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("4VP");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" and gains a ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.society);
				yield return base.text(" token.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.players > 3 && this.Vars.allyD == "hunters")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameD);
				yield return base.text(" III gains ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("4VP");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" and gains a ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.society);
				yield return base.text(" token.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.players > 4 && this.Vars.allyE == "hunters")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameE);
				yield return base.text(" III gains ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("4VP");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" and gains a ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.society);
				yield return base.text(" token.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
		}
		else
		{
			if (this.Vars.allyA == "wolves")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
				yield return base.text(" III gains ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("4VP");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" and gains a ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.society);
				yield return base.text(" token.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.allyB == "wolves")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
				yield return base.text(" III gains ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("4VP");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" and gains a ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.society);
				yield return base.text(" token.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.players > 2 && this.Vars.allyC == "wolves")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameC);
				yield return base.text(" III gains ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("4VP");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" and gains a ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.society);
				yield return base.text(" token.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.players > 3 && this.Vars.allyD == "wolves")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameD);
				yield return base.text(" III gains ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("4VP");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" and gains a ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.society);
				yield return base.text(" token.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.players > 4 && this.Vars.allyE == "wolves")
			{
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameE);
				yield return base.text(" III gains ");
				using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
				{
					yield return base.text("4VP");
				}
				styleScope2 = null;
				yield return base.text(" and gains a ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.society);
				yield return base.text(" token.");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

The force of the wolf's words caused tears to stream down their cheeks.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();

}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage231_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Cure for Yellow Fever");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.SymposiumMiddlenextPsg == "" || this.Vars.SymposiumMiddlenextPsg == 0)
	{
		this.Vars.SymposiumMiddlenextPsg = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			1,
			2,
			3
		});
	}
	this.Vars.midquote = this.Vars.SymposiumMiddlenextPsg;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("\"Vague, tawdry.\" The notes from the lectures created a tableau of mixed reactions. ");
	if (this.Vars.midquote == 1)
	{
		yield return base.text("\"All angst and ambition without respect for traditional ethics or the scientific method. Unsupported hypotheses, and rapid-fire homeopathic conjecture.\"");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.midquote == 2)
	{
		yield return base.text("\"Of note, however, was one intriguing if not juvenile statement. I jotted the quote down for posterity and so that others at the state may enjoy it when I plaster the message all across the lavatories. The quote:");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("'It's simple. Wash your hands after you touch your butt.'\"");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("\"Delightfully crude, but potentially insightful. Overall though, the lectures were amusing for what they lacked in substance.\"");
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("At first they seemed intrigued, but the presentations, while exciting, proved to have only minimal scientific value in their eyes. It was decided by the majority to research any other notable discoveries in their portfolio before making their recommendations.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.pub == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.text("And it was the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("publication");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" of a ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Yellow Fever");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" inoculation from an otherwise unknown town in Hungary that made their decision to build a University in the region much easier.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "SymposiumSuccess", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("And without the publication of a proposed ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Yellow Fever");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.text(" inoculation, their decision on the value of a university in a small town in Hungary was easy to make.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.link("Click here to continue...", "SymposiumFail", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = this.Vars.NoHospitalConsnextPsg;
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "AdvanceJournalTrack";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.Vars.hospA == 0 || this.Vars.hospA == "")
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Dr. ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
				yield return base.text(" III");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Move forward ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("1 level on the Journal Track of your choice");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.hospB == 0 || this.Vars.hospB == "")

			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Dr. ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
				yield return base.text(" III");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Move forward ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		if (this.Vars.players > 2 && (this.Vars.hospC == 0 || this.Vars.hospC == ""))

			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

				yield return base.text("Dr. ");

			{

	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage237_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.costE == "Biology")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2E = "Animal";
	}
	if (this.Vars.costE == "Engineering")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2E = "Gear";
	}
	if (this.Vars.costE == "Chemistry")
	{
		this.Vars.cost2E = "Bottle";
	}
	if (this.ispopup)
	{
		this.ispopup = false;
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.OnGenerationBtn("NewMaster3E", "Give your creation a new, majestic name:", "string", 0.5f);
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.creationE = ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueString();
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		this.ispopup = true;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The ");
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"Infamous",
			"Transcendent",
			"Monumental",
			"Nefarious",
			"Unspeakable",
			"Legendary",
			"Noble",
			"Phenomenal",
			"Stunning",
			"Masterful",
			"Insidious"
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationE);
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.passage("MWCreationHubE", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("With my own destiny determined, I resolved to forge a new path into the future and create my Masterwork.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("You may check the cost of completing your new Masterwork at any time by clicking on your name on the main Storybook screen.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "NewMHub", null);
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage239_Init()

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage239_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"The Work is Done",
			"I Have Done the Impossible",
			"My Legacy is Ensured",
			"AH HA HA HAAAAA!!!",
			"My Glorious Creation",
			"The Glory is Mine Forever!"
		}));
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("- ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameE);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("- Journal Entry Excerpt");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.typeE == "creature")
	{
		yield return base.text("Upon the stroke of midnight, lightning struck metal, sending a terrible electrical current through the machinery. My creation awoke, and with wild eyes gazed upon me, its creator. I had done it! I had created life!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeE == "power")
	{
		yield return base.text("To see my work in the flesh, to see ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationE);
		yield return base.text(" finally realized; the passion of the moment overwhelmed my senses. I had done it. I shook my fist at God and all who doubted me! You were wrong! I am invincible!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeE == "robot")
	{
		yield return base.text("A brief, blinding flash and the work was done. I threw my goggles to the floor to gaze upon my creation with my own eyes - ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationE);
		yield return base.text(". The polished metal surface whirred with interior mechanisms churning - then, glorious motion! Oh wondrous automaton, with you by my side the scientific world will be humbled!");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeE == "weapon")
	{
		yield return base.text("I seized the firing mechanism and squeezed the polished metal trigger. When the dust settled and my laboratory wall had been made to crumble into dust, I was unable to contain a sinister grin. The world would remember this day and the weapon I had wrought. My fame would be legendary.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeE == "medicine")
	{
		yield return base.text("I tapped the glass bottle, watching the liquid inside swirl and glow with the purity of the mixture. The ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationE);
		yield return base.text(" had been a stunning success and once mass production could be attained, my family's legacy would be secure. I laughed. Then, laughed again. My cacophonous laughter echoed off the stone walls of my estate for years to come.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeE == "drug")
	{
		yield return base.text("I observed the effects as the syringe filled with ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationE);
		yield return base.text(" emptied its contents into the unwilling test subject. Just as I had expected, the reaction was immediate and effusive. For so many years, I had toiled away in the solitude of my estate, and now as I wiped the tears from eyes, my beautiful creation was finally complete.");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.typeD == "demon")
	{
		yield return base.text("The world darkened around me as the ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationE);
		yield return base.text(" emerged from a void-like rift in time and space. I could feel the immense power of the insidious being, the air hot with the energy of their presence. They turned to me and with a deep growl, they stated, \"Master.\" I had done it. I was now in control and the world would rue the day they doubted ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameE);
		yield return base.text(" III!");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("The preparations proved tedious, but the resulting wave of spiritual energy as the ritual was completed left me standing in awe of my creation. The ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.creationE);

	}

	styleScope = null;

private void passage255_Init()
{
	base.Passages["SymposiumEvent2"] = new StoryPassage("SymposiumEvent2", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage255_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage255_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.players == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.symp = this.macros1.random(3.0, 4.0);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.players == 3)
	{
		this.Vars.symp = this.macros1.random(4.0, 6.0);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.players == 4)
	{
		this.Vars.symp = this.macros1.random(6.0, 8.0);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.players == 5)
	{
		this.Vars.symp = this.macros1.random(8.0, 10.0);
	}
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("For the Advancement of ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.sci3);
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The symposium began with a series of lectures from various noted ");
	if (this.Vars.sci3 == "Biology")
	{
		yield return base.text("biologists");
	}
	else if (this.Vars.sci3 == "Chemistry")
	{
		yield return base.text("chemists");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.text("engineers");
	}
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("from Eastern Europe. When it was their time to present, each cousin in turn rolled in a large cart covered with a velvet blanket to conceal their work until the appropriate moment during the lecture.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("As noted by several critics, each family member went well over their allotted time, providing eye-opening live demonstrations during the peak of their lectures that required many in the first rows of the operating theater to change into a clean outfit after the end of the exhibition.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The spirited presentations stunned the community to abject silence.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "SymposiumEvent3", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			if (this.Vars.players == 2)
			{
				this.Vars.tracker = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
				{
					6,
					7
				});
			}
			if (this.Vars.players == 3)
			{
				this.Vars.tracker = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
				{
					7,
					8
				});
			}
			if (this.Vars.players == 4)
			{
				this.Vars.tracker = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
				{
					9,
					10,
					11
				});
			}
			if (this.Vars.players == 5)
			{
				this.Vars.tracker = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
				{
					10,
					11,
					12
				});
			}
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.tracker);
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and the ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token one space to the left.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Suspicion Marker");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The Suspicion Marker represents the furthest right that the ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("can move during a Generation. This marker stays in the same location throughout the current Generation and the ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token can never be moved ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

			yield return base.text("onto or past");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("this marker by any actions or abilities during gameplay.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield break;
	yield break;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage257_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{

	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 19;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "AngryMobSetup1";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Turn to page ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

			yield return base.text("10");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("of the Village Chronicle.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Place the Suspicion Marker on space ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			if (this.Vars.University1 == 0 || this.Vars.University1 == "")
			{
				this.Vars.University1 = 1;
				this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) + 2;
				if (this.Vars.players == 4)
				{
					this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) + 1;
				}
				if (this.Vars.players == 5)
				{
					this.Vars.tracker = int.Parse(this.Vars.tracker) + 1;
				}
			}
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.tracker);
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and the ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token one space to the left. ");
		if (this.Vars.players == 3)
		{
			yield return base.text("Then, since this is a 3-player game, pass the starting player marker clockwise 1 additional time.");
		}
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Nobel Prize in Medicine");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The scientific world has finally taken notice of ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and its ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.playtxt);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("ingenious scholars. The absurdity of it all! Not only does this hamper their ability to experiment freely, it also gives their work mainstream merit.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("At the End of the Generation, the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("least ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("player will be awarded this prestigious award and ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("lose 7VP.");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
	{

		{
			yield return base.text("Perfect Mental Balance");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("At the end of the Generation, if your piece is on space ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.mental);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("of the ");
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Insanity_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");

	yield return base.text("MASTERWORK REMOVED");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Immortality reward");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("(Panacea return)");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("CREATE-A-MASTERWORK");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Storybook Event - Barventures");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Event - VOTE - to introduce Electricity to the town. They may not like it. It may not be worth the trouble, but the benefits could allow them to Experiment more quickly.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Reset Creepy Meter by visiiting Pub, then consult the Storybook.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Knowledge is Creepy - gain Creepy for each Knowledge you have at the end of a round.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Create-A-Masterwork");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Kinda makes no sense that Immortality occurs along with MW destruction.");
	yield break;
}

	yield return base.lineBreak();

		this.Vars.hunt2b = this.Vars.hunttemp["4th"];

	}

	}

	{
		this.Vars.h2c = this.Vars.nameA;
	}
	if (this.Vars.hunt1c == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.h2c = this.Vars.nameB;
	}

	{

		this.Vars.h1b = this.Vars.nameB;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage270_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The Pathway Was Blocked");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The impenetrable haze swirled at its center like a small vortex, alive and billowing, before revealing a massive beast bathed in smoky luminescence. 	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("And where a face should have been, only a dark, empty abyss could be seen, surrounded by a nest of thick, oily tentacles  a dark headdress of serpents floating in space, unnatural and unseeing, yet devilish to behold. And thus the ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Moonlight Presence");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("made itself known.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.huntbeast = "Moonlight Presence";
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Moonlight Presence");
	}
	styleScope = null;

		"low, rumbling growl",
		"strained gasp for air"
	}));
	yield return base.text(" ");

	yield return base.text("was never to be seen again.");

	yield break;
	yield break;
}
