private void passage279_Init()
{
	base.Passages["EffectRandomizer"] = new StoryPassage("EffectRandomizer", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage279_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage279_Main()
{
	this.Vars.effect = this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
	{
		"DetEffect1",
		"DetEffect2",
		"DetEffect3",
		"DetEffect4"
	});
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.det1 == "visited")
	{
		this.Vars.effect = this.Vars.effect - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"DetEffect1"
		});
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.det2 == "visited")
	{
		this.Vars.effect = this.Vars.effect - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"DetEffect2"
		});
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.det3 == "visited")
	{
		this.Vars.effect = this.Vars.effect - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"DetEffect3"
		});
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.det4 == "visited")
	{
		this.Vars.effect = this.Vars.effect - this.macros1.a(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"DetEffect4"
		});
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.effect = this.macros1.shuffled(new StoryVar[]
	{
		(HarloweSpread)this.Vars.effect
	});
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.tempeffect = this.Vars.effect["1st"];
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.abort(this.Vars.tempeffect);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
}

private void passage286_Init()

}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage286_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Reveal this screen to all players to confirm your Masterwork has been completed.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.tempcomp == this.Vars.nameA)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCreationHubA", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	else if (this.Vars.tempcomp == this.Vars.nameB)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCreationHubB", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	else if (this.Vars.tempcomp == this.Vars.nameC)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCreationHubC", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	else if (this.Vars.tempcomp == this.Vars.nameD)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCreationHubD", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	else if (this.Vars.tempcomp == this.Vars.nameE)
	{
		yield return base.passage("MWCreationHubE", Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If you have paid all necessary costs and completed your Masterwork, ");
	yield return base.link("click here to continue...", "MWComplete", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.round == 16)
	{
		yield return base.link("If not, click to return...", "NoUni1", null);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.round == 17)
	{
		yield return base.link("If not, click to return...", "NoUni2", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.link("If not, click to return...", "NoUni3", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage287_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GENERATION III:");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The Order Revealed");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I will attempt to relay the events as they were explained to me, though I fully understand the solemn repercussions of the unfathomable knowledge contained within this text.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Amongst the forests of the Romanian countryside, nestled in shadowed valleys of the Carpathian mountains, there are places so far removed from the rest of the world as to appear almost invisible in their machinations. In shadows tucked away amongst the deepest tangled forests, from the darkest crevices burrowed deep into the earth, these are the places where our most pervasive legends and folklore emerge. And in their isolation, it grows.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The next generation's return was marked by a most startling and terrifying discovery. For it appeared that while the disease had left the town, another more insidious plague had befallen the land. The Order of St. Hubertus, emboldened by the success of their clandestine labors, took the opportunity afforded them and manifested in their true and cursed forms. And like the emblematic wolfhead adorning their insignia, they arose with silvered pelts, baring distended fangs and open animalistic maws that dripped with saliva. The least horrifying held this form at least, as the other beasts hosted swelling deformities and twisted extremities too repulsive to describe. The ancient evils they had unearthed from beneath the town gave them the ability to transform without the full moon's glow, and in the light of day, these monstrous beings set upon the townsfolk to enforce their rule either by coercion or by visceral and bloody execution.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The beasts were real.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("But as the Order expanded its numbers and influence, the beasts did not recognize their new forms as folly. They called themselves \"Strigoi\" (embracing the vampiric moniker given them by local folklore) and commanded quick control over the local government. To them, they were the powerful new evolution of society. They perceived humanity as the real monster!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("However, they were not unkeen to the important work of the family. In fact, they took a great interest in their experimentations, even to the point of offering their assistance. And as the new generation was thrust into this distorted new reality, they were forced to consider a most dreadful prospect: to aid these creatures in their scheme and spread their message of dreadful bloodlust or incur their loathsome wrath.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "EvilConsequences", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

		yield return base.text("and ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(".");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage294_Main()
{
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Carefully hand this storybook device to ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.gen1creep);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("and do not allow any other players to see the screen.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000294"))
	{
		yield return base.link("Once you are ready, click here to reveal your secret conversation.", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000294", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage294_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage297_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Ridiculous!");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.seedy = "no";
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("As one might expect, the next few pages of notes in the journal are filled with unflattering jests and laughter at this absolutely half-witted rube and the seedy proposition they had offered. And so ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.gen1creep);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("waved them away with flippant disregard for wasting their time.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("An individual has no allegiance but to one's self. They would not be saddled with some unknown, absurd consequence!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("However, unbeknownst to the semi-virtuous scientist, there was another party that observed this gesture with great interest. Perhaps in time this mystery would be revealed.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.Gen1CreepyNonextPsg == "" || this.Vars.Gen1CreepyNonextPsg == 0)
	{
		this.Vars.Gen1CreepyNonextPsg = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			1,
			2
		});
	}
	this.Vars.randrew = this.Vars.Gen1CreepyNonextPsg;
	if (this.Vars.randrew == 1)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000297"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000297", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage297_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else if (this.Vars.round == 1)
	{
		this.Vars.creepy4 = 1;
		yield return base.link("Click to return...", "Fever1", null);
	}
	else if (this.Vars.round == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.creepy4 = 1;
		yield return base.link("Click to return...", "Fever2", null);
	}
	else
	{
		this.Vars.creepy4 = 1;
		yield return base.link("Click to return...", "Fever3", null);
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage302_Main()
{
	this.Vars.letterSetRandomize = 1;
	if (this.Vars.vacation == "yes")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Absent Parent");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Carefully hand this storybook device to ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.gen1sane);
			yield return base.text(".");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("An investment in a summer home meant time away from the estate, and these increasingly frequent visits to rekindle sanity meant ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.gen1sane);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("II's childhood guidance came more from the servants around the home than from their parental figures. This left an unfortunate void in their psychological development, one that affected their actions for the remainder of their life.");
		if (this.Vars.Gen1Insanity_YesnextPsg == "" || this.Vars.Gen1Insanity_YesnextPsg == 0)
		{
			this.Vars.Gen1Insanity_YesnextPsg = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
			{
				1,
				2
			});
		}
		this.Vars.instemp = this.Vars.Gen1Insanity_YesnextPsg;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000302"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000302", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage302_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("Devastation1");
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

{

	{
		if (this.Vars.vacation == "no")
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("More Time Than Ever");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope = null;

			yield return base.text(" ");

			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();

			yield return base.lineBreak();

			}
			styleScope = null;
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			if (this.Vars.round == 7)
			{
				yield return base.abort("Hospital1");
			}
			else if (this.Vars.round == 8)
			{
				yield return base.abort("Hospital2");
			}
			else
			{
				yield return base.abort("Hospital3");
			}
			yield return base.lineBreak();
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else
	{
		if (this.Vars.round == 7)
		{
			yield return base.abort("Hospital1");
		}
		else if (this.Vars.round == 8)
		{
			yield return base.abort("Hospital2");
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.abort("Hospital3");
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield return base.lineBreak();

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage315_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Another Opportunity");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Along with a newfound sense of acceptance and encouragement for the works of the young cousins, the university also consulted with the family on emerging matters of progressive importance.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Please choose the player with the least VP:");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	using (base.styleScope("italic", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("(ties are broken by the player that went later in turn order on the previous round.)");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00198"))
	{
		yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameA, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00198", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage315_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00199"))
	{
		yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameB, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00199", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage315_Fragment_1), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players > 2)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00200"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameC, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00200", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage315_Fragment_2), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.players > 3)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00201"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameD, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00201", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage315_Fragment_3), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	if (this.Vars.players > 4)
	{
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00202"))
		{
			yield return base.link(this.Vars.nameE, null, () => base.enchantHook("h00202", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage315_Fragment_4), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage316_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("A Return to Evil - Late Years");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	this.Vars.round = 15;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.overrun == "yes")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "S1_Suspicious_Building";
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Place all Suspicious Building tiles nearby, then turn to page ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("18");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" of the Village Chronicle.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Return the ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Engineering Master's Study");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" Estate Upgrade to the scenario box.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			if (this.Vars.exposeA > 0)
			{
				yield return base.text("Place the ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.ba);
				yield return base.text(" tile over spot A on the Village Chronicle. ");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.exposeB > 0)
			{
				yield return base.text("Place the ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.bb);
				yield return base.text(" tile over spot B on the Village Chronicle. ");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.exposeC > 0)
			{
				yield return base.text("Place the ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.bc);
				yield return base.text(" tile over spot C on the Village Chronicle.");
			}
		}
		styleScope = null;
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("MONSTER SPAWN");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("The Town Hall of the village has been transformed into the unofficial headquarters of the Order. When a player visits the Monster Spawn, they may ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Perform an Experiment");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(".");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			this.Vars.ending = "END-WolvesEvil2";
			yield return base.link("Click at the end of the Generation to continue to Final Scoring...", "Scoring", null);
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("setupStyle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SETUP");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "S1_Suspicious_Building";
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.text("Place all Suspicious Building tiles nearby, return the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" token on the Farmer's Market to the scenario box, then turn to page ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("18");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			yield return base.text(" of the Village Chronicle.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
			}
			styleScope2 = null;
			this.Vars._SetupImage = "Creepy_Icon";
			yield return base.text("Return all ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" tokens from player Estates to the scenario box. Remove the Storybook token from the ");
			yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
			yield return base.text(" Track.");
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			yield return base.lineBreak();
			if (this.Vars.exposeA > 0)
			{
				yield return base.text("Place the ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.ba);
				yield return base.text(" tile over spot A on the Village Chronicle. ");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.exposeB > 0)
			{
				yield return base.text("Place the ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.bb);
				yield return base.text(" tile over spot B on the Village Chronicle. ");
				yield return base.lineBreak();
			}
			if (this.Vars.exposeC > 0)
			{
				yield return base.text("Place the ");
				yield return base.text(this.Vars.bc);
				yield return base.text(" tile over spot C on the Village Chronicle.");
			}
		}
		styleScope = null;
		using (base.styleScope("hubTitle", true))
		{
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("MONSTER SPAWN");
			}
			StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hubDetails", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("The Town Hall of the village has been transformed into the unofficial headquarters of the Order. When a player visits the Monster Spawn, they may ");
			using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
			{
				yield return base.text("Perform an Experiment");

			yield return base.lineBreak();

	yield break;

private void passage317_Init()
{
	base.Passages["HuntSuccessCheck"] = new StoryPassage("HuntSuccessCheck", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage317_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage317_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.huntcount == 2)
	{
		this.Vars.huntresult = "success";
	}
	if (this.Vars.huntcount == 1)
	{
		this.Vars.huntresult = this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
		{
			"success",
			"failure"
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.huntcount == 0)
	{
		this.Vars.huntresult = "failure";
	}
	if (this.Vars.huntresult == "success")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("A ");
			yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
			{
				"Righteous",
				"Wondrous"
			}));
			yield return base.text(" Fate");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("One by one, the steel weapons were dropped into the wooden chest; the clang of glaives, daggers, and morningstars reverberating through the lodge. They wiped the blood from tri-cornered hats and hung their polished rifles on hooks upon the walls. Affecting a cool manner, they calmed their shaken nerves with plinka, a brandy that burned like hot coals on the throat and anesthetized their thoughts.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("They would remain vigilant until the pestilence was wiped from the land, but with ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.huntcount);
		yield return base.text(" successful hunt, the worst of it was over. The hunt has been a success.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h000317"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h000317", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage317_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
	}
	else
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Overrun By ");
			yield return base.text(this.macros1.either(new StoryVar[]
			{
				"Demons",
				"Monsters"
			}));
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The scud banked across the moon, enveloping the entire valley in a dismal, silvery cocoon.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The townsfolk had placed the fate of ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
		yield return base.text(" into the hands of a group of leather-clad cretins willing to engage in hand-to-hand combat with supernatural forces beyond their understanding. Ultimately, the scientists scoffed at their futile struggle.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Embittered by what had been taken from them for this fool's errand, the cousins observed the chaos, protected from the wailing screams of a town overwhelmed by creatures. Perched upon their veranda, they sipped fresh coffee as the hellish minions descended upon the town to exert their terrible influence. The hunt had failed.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		this.Vars.overrun = "yes";
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "Prosperity3b", null);
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

	this.Vars.overrun = "no";
	using (base.styleScope("setupStyleEvnt", true))
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "S1_MastersStudy";
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("Retrieve the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Chemistry");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" and ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Biology Master's Study");
		}
		styleScope2 = null;
		yield return base.text(" Vanity Estate Upgrades from the scenario box and place them nearby. Any time you gain a Vanity Estate Upgrade, you may choose to gain 1 of these instead.");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage318_Init()

}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage318_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Editor's note - August 1923");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	ViewGenerationEnding.instance.EnableDisableContinueBtn(true);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Hello Ensign,");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I've looked over the manuscript you submitted and I have to admit that it is not what I would have expected. The foreword promises a harrowing and potentially supernatural series of events that test the limits of imagination. However, the story tells a cohesive and somewhat uplifting tale of a family of reformed scientists making the world a better place. I admit that in some cases the means to which this is accomplished is morosely detailed and quite unorthodox, but overall the story seems incomplete.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If I may paraphrase: A scientific family enters into the political theater and then assists the Church with charitable donations towards building a hospital. This decision results in prosperity in the region ");
	if (this.Vars.cured == 1)
	{
		yield return base.text("\"which is further improved by the generous creation of an unprecedented cure for Yellow Fever.\" ");
	}
	if (this.Vars.uni == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.text("After which, they put on an excellent Symposium that attracts a University to the area. ");
	}
	if (this.Vars.ultimate == "yes")
	{
		yield return base.text("They even create an unintentional vaccine that essentially eliminates all disease from the region. ");
	}
	yield return base.text("Ultimately, their work is instrumental in catapulting Hungary and ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("into the international spotlight. It is very uplifting and has a good potential to sell well to the burgeoning educational market in London.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Recommendation - alter descriptions in early chapters to reflect a more uplifting tale. Omit horror and supernatural elements. Offer happy ending.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I look forward to seeing your revisions.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("THE END?");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage319_Main()
{

	}

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The horses reared as a blinding vein of lightning arced across the tempestuous sky, followed by a thunderous rapport that shook the ground beneath their hooves. The anxious party stood at a crossing in the roadway, trembling as they surveyed their surroundings.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("To the north, a thick fog swallowed the moors, the gray mist obscuring the horrors hidden beneath. To the east, the road entered a dark forest of foreboding trees with limbs entangled. To the West, the sky burned a deep red above the rocky mountains, seething with demonic ferocity.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("It was also possible to return south to the village again and see what lurked amongst the cordoned streets and torchlight.");

		{
			this.Vars.h1a,
			this.Vars.h1b
		}));

	}

	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{

	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

	{
		yield return base.link("North to the moors. Both players gain 2 " + this.Vars.reward1 + ".", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00203", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage319_Fragment_0), false));
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00204"))
	{
		yield return base.link("East to the dark forest. Both players gain 2 " + this.Vars.reward2 + ".", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00204", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage319_Fragment_1), false));

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage321_Main()
{
	yield return base.passage(this.Vars.direction, Array.Empty<StoryVar>());
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.huntreward1);
		yield return base.text(".");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("VOTE");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Both players on the Hunt take their Voting tokens into their hand. They will secretly choose a side to place face up in their palm. Then they will close their fist and extend it to the center of the table.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("A ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Yay");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("vote is a vote to ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("contribute");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("to the Hunt.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("A ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Nay");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("vote is a vote to ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("keep your resources");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(".");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If BOTH players choose to contribute, all Servants will survive and each player will ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("pay 1 ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.huntreward1);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("to the supply.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If 1 player chooses to contribute, all Servants will survive and the contributing player will ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("pay 2 ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.huntreward1);
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("to the supply.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If neither player chooses to contribute, their Servants will go to Lost and the ");
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"AngryMob_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("token will move 1 space to the left.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The Result of the Vote");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Did at least one player vote to contribute to the Hunt?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Yes.", "HuntSuccess1", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("No.", "HuntFail1", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage325_Init()
{
	base.Passages["ProsperityWolvesIntro"] = new StoryPassage("ProsperityWolvesIntro", new string[]
	{
		"INTRO"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage325_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage325_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("GENERATION III:");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("The Order Revealed");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I will attempt to relay the events as they were explained to me, though I fully understand the solemn repercussions of the unfathomable knowledge contained within this text.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Could a period of prosperity emerge like a blooming lily in the shadow of a headstone? Could it thrive in soil so enriched by disease and death? With the evil machinations exposed and banished from the town, the Order of St. Hubertus was quick to answer these questions with reforms that cleared the smog and grayness from the streets. They tilled the fields till the beet flowers sprung from the earth, encouraged trade with nearby towns, and embraced modern conveniences, even so far as to negotiate an extension of the national electrical power grid. The youths, upon returning from university to claim their inheritance, could scarcely recognize the village from their childhood.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("But, it soon became clear why they were so determined to be accepted and improve their reputation. For one evening, when the blood moon crossed the evening sky, they transformed, revealing the monstrous beings they had kept secret for so many years as the unafflicted in the town looked on in horror.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("The beasts were real.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("But the beasts did not recognize their new forms as folly. Though their bodies shifted into monstrosities more animal than man - more wolven, with sharp features, claws, and steel-eyed gazes - they pleaded with the public for compassion. Should we not celebrate that which makes us different? Is it not these differences that allow us to grow stronger together?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("They believed that every creature was special in their own way and were convinced that reformation could tame the impulses of any creature be it man or beast. And with that hope in their hollow hearts, they endeavored to spread a message of love and acceptance to all humans.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("O poor, misguided wretches!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Had the human inhabitants not suddenly found themselves outnumbered by a den of nightmarish beings, they may have voiced their opposition with violent reprisal. But, with no option to the contrary, the monsters retained their hellish visages and life returned to a semblance of normalcy.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("That is, until the scientists once again began their work in earnest and attracted the Order's attention.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "GoodConsequences", null);
	this.Vars.gen3pg = 0;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private void passage326_Init()
{
	base.Passages["ScoreEntryP1"] = new StoryPassage("ScoreEntryP1", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage326_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage326_Main()
{
	if (this.ispopup)
	{
		this.ispopup = false;
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.OnGenerationBtn("ScoreEntryP1", "Please enter the final score for " + this.Vars.nameA + ".", "number", 0.5f);
	}
	if (ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueNumber() >= 0)
	{
		this.Vars.scoreA = ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueNumber();
		this.ispopup = true;
	}
	yield return base.text("Thank you for recording this important historical information, ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameA);
	yield return base.text(".");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.link("Click to continue.", "ScoreEntryP2", null);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
}

private void passage327_Init()
{
	base.Passages["WinnerHUB"] = new StoryPassage("WinnerHUB", new string[]
	{
		"CODINGHELP"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage327_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage327_Main()
{
	List<float> list = new List<float>();
	List<float> winnerPlayerPoints = new List<float>();
	List<NamePoints> PlayerNameAndPoint = new List<NamePoints>();
	list.Add((float)this.Vars.scoreA);
	PlayerNameAndPoint.Add(new NamePoints
	{
		playerName = this.Vars.nameA,
		Points = this.Vars.scoreA
	});
	list.Add((float)this.Vars.scoreB);
	PlayerNameAndPoint.Add(new NamePoints
	{
		playerName = this.Vars.nameB,
		Points = this.Vars.scoreB
	});
	if (this.Vars.scoreC > 0 && this.Vars.nameC != null)
	{
		list.Add((float)this.Vars.scoreC);
		PlayerNameAndPoint.Add(new NamePoints
		{
			playerName = this.Vars.nameC,
			Points = this.Vars.scoreC
		});
	}
	if (this.Vars.scoreD > 0 && this.Vars.nameD != null)
	{
		list.Add((float)this.Vars.scoreD);
		PlayerNameAndPoint.Add(new NamePoints
		{
			playerName = this.Vars.nameD,
			Points = this.Vars.scoreD
		});
	}
	ViewRankingPage.instance.playerRankList.Clear();
	list.Sort();
	for (int k = list.Count - 1; k >= 0; k--)
	{
		winnerPlayerPoints.Add(list[k]);
	}
	int num;
	for (int i = 0; i < winnerPlayerPoints.Count; i = num + 1)
	{
		for (int j = 0; j < PlayerNameAndPoint.Count; j = num + 1)
		{
			if (winnerPlayerPoints[i] == (float)PlayerNameAndPoint[j].Points)
			{
				yield return base.text(string.Concat(new object[]
				{
					"Player Name :",
					PlayerNameAndPoint[j].playerName,
					" point : ",
					PlayerNameAndPoint[j].Points
				}));
				ViewRankingPage.instance.playerRankList.Add(PlayerNameAndPoint[j].playerName.ToString());
				yield return base.lineBreak();
				PlayerNameAndPoint.RemoveAt(j);
				break;
			}
			num = j;
		}
		num = i;
	}
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
}

private void passage1008_Init()
{
	base.Passages["VarEndingsPassage"] = new StoryPassage("VarEndingsPassage", new string[0], new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage1008_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage1008_Main()
{
	this.Vars.winner = GLOBALS.winnerName;
	ViewGenerationEnding.instance.EnableDisableContinueBtn(true);
	yield return base.abort(this.Vars.ending);
	yield break;
}

{

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage328_Main()
{
	if (this.ispopup)
	{
		this.ispopup = false;
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.Clear();
		ViewPopupPanel.instance.OnGenerationBtn("ScoreEntryP2", "Please enter the final score for " + this.Vars.nameB + ".", "number", 0.5f);
	}
	if (ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueNumber() >= 0)
	{
		this.Vars.scoreB = ViewPopupPanel.instance.PassageValueNumber();
		this.ispopup = true;
	}
	yield return base.text("Thank you for recording this important historical information, ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.nameB);
	yield return base.text(".");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	if (this.Vars.players < 3)
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "WinnerHUB", null);
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.link("Click to continue...", "ScoreEntryP3", null);
	}
	yield break;
}

private void passage332_Init()
{

}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage332_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("Overshadowed and Exploited");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	ViewGenerationEnding.instance.EnableDisableContinueBtn(true);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("While this history may contain a modicum of inconceivable occurrences that stretch the limits of the imagination, it remains a peculiar story relegated to an obscure place and time. It is a mostly forgotten artifact of an era of pseudo-science and speculation that amounted to very little historical significance.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("For it was not the experimentations of ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.playtxt);
	yield return base.text(" ");
	yield return base.text("ambitious and incredulous scientists that were remembered, it was the Hunters that amassed fame, wealth, and respect on the backs of the superstitious peasants. The disease that wreaked havoc on the countryside was ignored; recast as a demonic presence from folklore; one that could only be kept at bay through the continued vigilance of the Fraternity of Hunters, which of course came at a great financial cost.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Over the next several years, the Fraternity and its members abandoned the town for more lucrative positions within the government. Soon the not-so-secret society became the affluent aristocrats controlling the entirety of the Hungarian political establishment from the shadows. And the family, who once commanded a measure of reverence, were assigned to obscure prefectures of their own across the country.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("If this story is to be believed, then their knowledge still remains trapped within the decaying walls of stone estates overlooking the forgotten village of ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
	yield return base.text(". The work was finally over.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("THE END?");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage333_Main()
{
	using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
	{
		yield return base.text("The Spread of Evil");
	}
	StyleScope styleScope = null;
	ViewGenerationEnding.instance.EnableDisableContinueBtn(true);
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("I write these final words under candle-light, from a shelter I have fashioned in the crawl-space beneath the manor. For a desk, a dusty plank of cedar. I try to keep my utensils above the floor which can become musty and dank during my frequent overnight stays: a dull quill, ink, several lengths of charcoal, a ream of parchment. It is no longer safe to sleep in my bed when night falls. The creatures emerge from the shadows to feed on the few souls that still remain, or to irreversibly change them into shambling horrors most unimaginable.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("To think that my work to uncover the genealogy of a mildly successful scientific family would cause me to become consumed by a maelstrom of spreading evil! It is my hope that when I complete this writing (if I complete this writing), that these words will offer a history to condemn these fools and their complicity with demons. The world must know who is responsible. It must condemn the group who coddled darkness and made a mockery of science!");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("O God, I hear the creatures again! Their malformed claw-tips scratching at the floorboards! Damn them for what they have done! Damn this infernal work. For it has unleashed a plague upon the land of which there can be no end in sight.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("THE END?");
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

			yield return base.text("A Message of Confirmation");

		{
			yield return base.text("expose");
		}
		styleScope = null;

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage353_Main()

		yield return base.text(this.Vars.mayor);
		yield return base.text(" ");
		yield return base.text("III. This passage is read out loud in view of all players.");
	}
	styleScope = null;
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text("Though memories of the past may be harsh or serene, one cannot deny the significance of those distinctive few whose actions set the gears in motion. ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.mayor);
	yield return base.text("'s namesake was still whispered amongst the townfolk of ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
	yield return base.text(". ");
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.mayor);
	yield return base.text("'s contribution to the wellbeing of all may have been acute, but it was noticeable nonetheless.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.text(this.Vars.mayor);
	yield return base.text("'s family legacy, whether through infamy or prestige, raged onward to press upon the boundaries of science and common decency.");
	yield return base.lineBreak();
	yield return base.lineBreak();

private void passage355_Init()
{
	base.Passages["MayorLibraryEvil"] = new StoryPassage("MayorLibraryEvil", new string[]
	{
		"revised"
	}, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage355_Main));
}

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage355_Main()
{
	if (this.Vars.building == "library")
	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Detestable Education");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("Carefully hand the Storybook to ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.mayor);
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("III.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("It was impossible for ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.mayor);
		yield return base.text(" III to convince them otherwise; for the new leaders of ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
		yield return base.text(", access to untamed knowledge had poisoned the pure minds of the citizens. They were well aware that it was ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.mayor);
		yield return base.text("'s ancestry that had brought this blight of terrible cognition to this fair town.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		if (this.Vars.society == "Fraternity of Hunters")
		{
			yield return base.text("For with knowledge came a lack of faith; a propensity to question authority and cause unwanted friction. It made them look upon ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.mayor);
			yield return base.text(" III the same way they looked upon the beasts they hunted in the wild.");
		}
		else
		{
			yield return base.text("For with knowledge came a way to overcome the fears inhabiting the hearts of all men - a fear that could be manipulated. And they bore a deep grudge against anyone that sook to quell that primal urge.");
		}
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		using (base.styleScope("hook", "h00000355"))
		{
			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00000355", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage355_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else if (this.Vars.hcount == 0 && this.Vars.society == "Order of St. Hubertus")
	{
		yield return base.abort("EvilWolvesEventStart");
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("LosingOrderAid");
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}

{
	ViewItemObtain.SetupPassagename = ((this.Vars.hcount == 0 && this.Vars.society == "Order of St. Hubertus") ? "EvilWolvesEventStart" : "LosingOrderAid");

		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("SPECIAL SETUP");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope2 = null;
		this.Vars._SetupImage = "S1_MayorCoin";
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.mayor);
		yield return base.text(" ");

		yield return base.text("<sprite=\"Creepy_Icon\" index=0>");
		yield return base.text(". Then, return the ");
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))

private IEnumerable<StoryOutput> passage359_Main()

	{
		using (base.styleScope("bold", true))
		{
			yield return base.text("The Stench of Man's Avarice");
		}
		StyleScope styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();

		{
			yield return base.text("Carefully hand the Storybook to ");
			yield return base.text(this.Vars.mayor);
			yield return base.text(" ");
			yield return base.text("III. This passage is read out loud in view of all players.");
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("These beastly apparitions may have squashed their hirsute forms into makeshift suits and summer dresses - photographs of which degrade the very silver they were impressed upon - but when the subject of money was discussed, they sneered in disgust.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.text("For they abhored all forms of numismatic pursuits, only abiding them as a necessity in their brief business dealings with the outside world. ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.mayor);
		yield return base.text(" III's family lineage bore the golden mark of this shameful greed, and set their noses twitching every time they entered ");
		yield return base.text(this.Vars.townname);
		yield return base.text("'s limits.");
		yield return base.lineBreak();
		yield return base.lineBreak();

			yield return base.link("Click to continue...", null, () => base.enchantHook("h00000359", HarloweEnchantCommand.Replace, new Func<IEnumerable<StoryOutput>>(this.passage359_Fragment_0), false));
		}
		styleScope = null;
		yield return base.lineBreak();
	}
	else
	{
		yield return base.abort("ResolveCharityWolves");
	}
	yield break;
	yield break;
}
